Image","level":2,"school":"Illusion","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

Three illusory duplicates of yourself appear in your space. Until the spell ends, the duplicates move with you and mimic your actions, shifting position so it’s impossible to track which image is real.

\r\n

Each time a creature hits you with an attack roll during the spell’s duration, roll a d6 for each of your remaining duplicates. If any of the d6s rolls a 3 or higher, one of the duplicates is hit instead of you, and the duplicate is destroyed. The duplicates otherwise ignore all other damage and effects. The spell ends when all three duplicates are destroyed.

\r\n

A creature is unaffected by this spell if it has the Blinded condition, Blindsight, or Truesight.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":false,"version":null,"sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":299,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Deception","Warding"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[{"sourceId":148,"pageNumber":299,"sourceType":1}],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":21171999,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":2619062,"definitionKey":"1118725998:2619062","name":"Silent Image","level":1,"school":"Illusion","duration":{"durationInterval":10,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":15},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 15-foot Cube. The image appears at a spot within range and lasts for the duration. The image is purely visual; it isn’t accompanied by sound, smell, or other sensory effects.

\r\n

As a Magic action, you can cause the image to move to any spot within range. As the image changes location, you can alter its appearance so that its movements appear natural for the image. For example, if you create an image of a creature and move it, you can alter the image so that it appears to be walking.

\r\n

Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, since things can pass through it. A creature that takes a Study action to examine the image can determine that it is an illusion with a successful Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the creature can see through the image.

Each creature of your choice in a 5-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn, at which point it must repeat the save. If the target fails the second save, the target has the Unconscious condition for the duration. The spell ends on a target if it takes damage or someone within 5 feet of it takes an action to shake it out of the spell’s effect.

\r\n

Creatures that don’t sleep, such as elves, or that have Immunity to the Exhaustion condition automatically succeed on saves against this spell.

\r\n

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d8 for each spell slot level above 1.

For the duration, magical Darkness spreads from a point within range and fills a 15-foot-radius Sphere. Darkvision can’t see through it, and nonmagical light can’t illuminate it.

\r\n

Alternatively, you cast the spell on an object that isn’t being worn or carried, causing the Darkness to fill a 15-foot Emanation originating from that object. Covering that object with something opaque, such as a bowl or helm, blocks the Darkness.

\r\n

If any of this spell’s area overlaps with an area of Bright Light or Dim Light created by a spell of level 2 or lower, that other spell is dispelled.

For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell’s school of magic.

\r\n

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":false,"version":null,"sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":262,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Detection"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[{"sourceId":148,"pageNumber":262,"sourceType":1}],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":30},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":21172228,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":2619099,"definitionKey":"1118725998:2619099","name":"Detect Thoughts","level":2,"school":"Divination","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You activate one of the effects below. Until the spell ends, you can activate either effect as a Magic action on your later turns.

\r\n

Sense Thoughts. You sense the presence of thoughts within 30 feet of yourself that belong to creatures that know languages or are telepathic. You don’t read the thoughts, but you know that a thinking creature is present.

\r\n

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

\r\n

Read Thoughts. Target one creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself or one creature within 30 feet of yourself that you detected with the Sense Thoughts option. You learn what is most on the target’s mind right now. If the target doesn’t know any languages and isn’t telepathic, you learn nothing.

\r\n

As a Magic action on your next turn, you can try to probe deeper into the target’s mind. If you probe deeper, the target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, you discern the target’s reasoning, emotions, and something that looms large in its mind (such as a worry, love, or hate). On a successful save, the spell ends. Either way, the target knows that you are probing into its mind, and until you shift your attention away from the target’s mind, the target can take an action on its turn to make an Intelligence (Arcana) check against your spell save DC, ending the spell on a success.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"1 Copper Piece","saveDcAbilityId":5,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":false,"version":null,"sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":262,"requiresSavingThrow":true,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Social","Detection"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[{"sourceId":148,"pageNumber":262,"sourceType":1}],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":21172247,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":2619101,"definitionKey":"1118725998:2619101","name":"Suggestion","level":2,"school":"Enchantment","duration":{"durationInterval":8,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You suggest a course of activity—described in no more than 25 words—to one creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you. The suggestion must sound achievable and not involve anything that would obviously deal damage to the target or its allies. For example, you could say, “Fetch the key to the cult’s treasure vault, and give the key to me.” Or you could say, “Stop fighting, leave this library peacefully, and don’t return.”

\r\n

The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Charmed condition for the duration or until you or your allies deal damage to the target. The Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for the target upon completing it.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,3],"componentsDescription":"a drop of honey","saveDcAbilityId":5,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":false,"version":null,"sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":320,"requiresSavingThrow":true,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Control","Social"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[{"sourceId":148,"pageNumber":320,"sourceType":1}],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":21172255,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":2619102,"definitionKey":"1118725998:2619102","name":"Disguise Self","level":1,"school":"Illusion","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear heavier or lighter. You must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs as you have. Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you.

\r\n

The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, if you use this spell to add a hat to your outfit, objects pass through the hat, and anyone who touches it would feel nothing.

\r\n

To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC.

A creature you touch has the Invisible condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

\r\n

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

With a touch, you place an illusion on a willing creature or an object that isn’t being worn or carried. A creature gains the Mask effect below, and an object gains the False Aura effect below. The effect lasts for the duration. If you cast the spell on the same target every day for 30 days, the illusion lasts until dispelled.

\r\n

Mask (Creature). Choose a creature type other than the target’s actual type. Spells and other magical effects treat the target as if it were a creature of the chosen type.

\r\n

False Aura (Object). You change the way the target appears to spells and magical effects that detect magical auras, such as Detect Magic. You can make a nonmagical object appear magical, make a magic item appear nonmagical, or change the object’s aura so that it appears to belong to a school of magic you choose.

One creature of your choice that you can see within range makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, it has the Prone and Incapacitated conditions for the duration. During that time, it laughs uncontrollably if it’s capable of laughter, and it can’t end the Prone condition on itself.

\r\n

At the end of each of its turns and each time it takes damage, it makes another Wisdom saving throw. The target has Advantage on the save if the save is triggered by damage. On a successful save, the spell ends.

\r\n

A Line of strong wind 60 feet long and 10 feet wide blasts from you in a direction you choose for the duration. Each creature in the Line must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away from you in a direction following the Line. A creature that ends its turn in the Line must make the same save.

\r\n

Any creature in the Line must spend 2 feet of movement for every 1 foot it moves when moving closer to you.

\r\n

The gust disperses gas or vapor, and it extinguishes candles and similar unprotected flames in the area. It causes protected flames, such as those of lanterns, to dance wildly and has a 50 percent chance to extinguish them.

\r\n

As a Bonus Action on your later turns, you can change the direction in which the Line blasts from you.

Choose a manufactured metal object, such as a metal weapon or a suit of Heavy or Medium metal armor, that you can see within range. You cause the object to glow red-hot. Any creature in physical contact with the object takes 2d8 Fire damage when you cast the spell. Until the spell ends, you can take a Bonus Action on each of your later turns to deal this damage again if the object is within range.

\r\n

If a creature is holding or wearing the object and takes the damage from it, the creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or drop the object if it can. If it doesn’t drop the object, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the start of your next turn.

\r\n

You touch a creature and choose Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma. For the duration, the target has Advantage on ability checks using the chosen ability.

\r\n

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2. You can choose a different ability for each target.

Floating Disk","level":1,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

This spell creates a circular, horizontal plane of force, 3 feet in diameter and 1 inch thick, that floats 3 feet above the ground in an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see within range. The disk remains for the duration and can hold up to 500 pounds. If more weight is placed on it, the spell ends, and everything on the disk falls to the ground.

\r\n

The disk is immobile while you are within 20 feet of it. If you move more than 20 feet away from it, the disk follows you so that it remains within 20 feet of you. It can move across uneven terrain, up or down stairs, slopes and the like, but it can’t cross an elevation change of 10 feet or more. For example, the disk can’t move across a 10-foot-deep pit, nor could it leave such a pit if it was created at the bottom.

\r\n

If you move more than 100 feet from the disk (typically because it can’t move around an obstacle to follow you), the spell ends.

For the duration, the spell enlarges or reduces a creature or an object you can see within range (see the chosen effect below). A targeted object must be neither worn nor carried. If the target is an unwilling creature, it can make a Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the spell has no effect.

\r\n

Everything that a targeted creature is wearing and carrying changes size with it. Any item it drops returns to normal size at once. A thrown weapon or piece of ammunition returns to normal size immediately after it hits or misses a target.

\r\n

Enlarge. The target’s size increases by one category—from Medium to Large, for example. The target also has Advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws. The target’s attacks with its enlarged weapons or Unarmed Strikes deal an extra 1d4 damage on a hit.

\r\n

Reduce. The target’s size decreases by one category—from Medium to Small, for example. The target also has Disadvantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws. The target’s attacks with its reduced weapons or Unarmed Strikes deal 1d4 less damage on a hit (this can’t reduce the damage below 1).

Throws","isGranted":false,"bonusTypes":[],"value":null,"availableToMulticlass":null,"modifierTypeId":0,"modifierSubTypeId":0,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"die":{"diceCount":null,"diceValue":null,"diceMultiplier":null,"fixedValue":null,"diceString":null},"count":1,"durationUnit":null,"usePrimaryStat":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]}}],"conditions":[],"tags":["Buff"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[{"sourceId":148,"pageNumber":268,"sourceType":1}],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":21172666,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":2619173,"definitionKey":"1118725998:2619173","name":"Illusory Script","level":1,"school":"Illusion","duration":{"durationInterval":10,"durationUnit":"Day","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You write on parchment, paper, or another suitable material and imbue it with an illusion that lasts for the duration. To you and any creatures you designate when you cast the spell, the writing appears normal, seems to be written in your hand, and conveys whatever meaning you intended when you wrote the text. To all others, the writing appears as if it were written in an unknown or magical script that is unintelligible. Alternatively, the illusion can alter the meaning, handwriting, and language of the text, though the language must be one you know.

\r\n

If the spell is dispelled, the original script and the illusion both disappear.

\r\n

A creature that has Truesight can read the hidden message.

You touch an object throughout the spell’s casting. If the object is a magic item or some other magical object, you learn its properties and how to use them, whether it requires Attunement, and how many charges it has, if any. You learn whether any ongoing spells are affecting the item and what they are. If the item was created by a spell, you learn that spell’s name.

\r\n

If you instead touch a creature throughout the casting, you learn which ongoing spells, if any, are currently affecting it.

You touch an object throughout the spell’s casting. If the object is a magic item or some other magical object, you learn its properties and how to use them, whether it requires Attunement, and how many charges it has, if any. You learn whether any ongoing spells are affecting the item and what they are. If the item was created by a spell, you learn that spell’s name.

\r\n

If you instead touch a creature throughout the casting, you learn which ongoing spells, if any, are currently affecting it.

You unleash a wave of thunderous energy. Each creature in a 15-foot Cube originating from you makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 Thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

\r\n

In addition, unsecured objects that are entirely within the Cube are pushed 10 feet away from you, and a thunderous boom is audible within 300 feet.

\r\n

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 1.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":false,"version":null,"sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":270,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Movement"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[{"sourceId":148,"pageNumber":270,"sourceType":1}],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":3},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":21172857,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":2619208,"definitionKey":"1118725998:2619208","name":"Web","level":2,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":20},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You conjure a mass of sticky webbing at a point within range. The webs fill a 20-foot Cube there for the duration. The webs are Difficult Terrain, and the area within them is Lightly Obscured.

\r\n

If the webs aren’t anchored between two solid masses (such as walls or trees) or layered across a floor, wall, or ceiling, the web collapses on itself, and the spell ends at the start of your next turn. Webs layered over a flat surface have a depth of 5 feet.

\r\n

The first time a creature enters the webs on a turn or starts its turn there, it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or have the Restrained condition while in the webs or until it breaks free.

\r\n

A creature Restrained by the webs can take an action to make a Strength (Athletics) check against your spell save DC. If it succeeds, it is no longer Restrained.

\r\n

The webs are flammable. Any 5-foot Cube of webs exposed to fire burns away in 1 round, dealing 2d4 Fire damage to any creature that starts its turn in the fire.

You conjure a mass of sticky webbing at a point within range. The webs fill a 20-foot Cube there for the duration. The webs are Difficult Terrain, and the area within them is Lightly Obscured.

\r\n

If the webs aren’t anchored between two solid masses (such as walls or trees) or layered across a floor, wall, or ceiling, the web collapses on itself, and the spell ends at the start of your next turn. Webs layered over a flat surface have a depth of 5 feet.

\r\n

The first time a creature enters the webs on a turn or starts its turn there, it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or have the Restrained condition while in the webs or until it breaks free.

\r\n

A creature Restrained by the webs can take an action to make a Strength (Athletics) check against your spell save DC. If it succeeds, it is no longer Restrained.

\r\n

The webs are flammable. Any 5-foot Cube of webs exposed to fire burns away in 1 round, dealing 2d4 Fire damage to any creature that starts its turn in the fire.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"a bit of spiderweb","saveDcAbilityId":2,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":false,"version":null,"sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":340,"requiresSavingThrow":true,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[{"type":1,"conditionId":13,"conditionDuration":0,"durationUnit":"Special","exception":"For the duration or until the target breaks free"}],"tags":["Control"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[{"sourceId":148,"pageNumber":340,"sourceType":1}],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":20},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":21172862,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":2619209,"definitionKey":"1118725998:2619209","name":"Unseen Servant","level":1,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

This spell creates an Invisible, mindless, shapeless, Medium force that performs simple tasks at your command until the spell ends. The servant springs into existence in an unoccupied space on the ground within range. It has AC 10, 1 Hit Point, and a Strength of 2, and it can’t attack. If it drops to 0 Hit Points, the spell ends.

\r\n

Once on each of your turns as a Bonus Action, you can mentally command the servant to move up to 15 feet and interact with an object. The servant can perform simple tasks that a human could do, such as fetching things, cleaning, mending, folding clothes, lighting fires, serving food, and pouring drinks. Once you give the command, the servant performs the task to the best of its ability until it completes the task, then waits for your next command.

\r\n

If you command the servant to perform a task that would move it more than 60 feet away from you, the spell ends.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"a bit of string and of wood","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":false,"version":null,"sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":336,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Control"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[{"sourceId":148,"pageNumber":336,"sourceType":1}],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":21172914,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":2619222,"definitionKey":"1118725998:2619222","name":"Alarm","level":1,"school":"Abjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":8,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":20},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You set an alarm against intrusion. Choose a door, a window, or an area within range that is no larger than a 20-foot Cube. Until the spell ends, an alarm alerts you whenever a creature touches or enters the warded area. When you cast the spell, you can designate creatures that won’t set off the alarm. You also choose whether the alarm is audible or mental:

\r\n

Audible Alarm. The alarm produces the sound of a handbell for 10 seconds within 60 feet of the warded area.

\r\n

Mental Alarm. You are alerted by a mental ping if you are within 1 mile of the warded area. This ping awakens you if you’re asleep.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"a bell and silver wire","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":false,"version":null,"sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":239,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Detection"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[{"sourceId":148,"pageNumber":239,"sourceType":1}],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":20},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":21713776,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":2619222,"definitionKey":"1118725998:2619222","name":"Alarm","level":1,"school":"Abjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":8,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":20},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You set an alarm against intrusion. Choose a door, a window, or an area within range that is no larger than a 20-foot Cube. Until the spell ends, an alarm alerts you whenever a creature touches or enters the warded area. When you cast the spell, you can designate creatures that won’t set off the alarm. You also choose whether the alarm is audible or mental:

\r\n

Audible Alarm. The alarm produces the sound of a handbell for 10 seconds within 60 feet of the warded area.

\r\n

Mental Alarm. You are alerted by a mental ping if you are within 1 mile of the warded area. This ping awakens you if you’re asleep.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"a bell and silver wire","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":false,"version":null,"sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":239,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Detection"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[{"sourceId":148,"pageNumber":239,"sourceType":1}],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":20},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":146650,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":24124,"definitionKey":"1118725998:24124","name":"Corpse Bomb","level":1,"school":"Necromancy","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":120,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

The corpse of a recently deceased creature rapidly bloats at your command and erupts in a gruesome explosion. You target the corpse of a creature that's been dead for no longer than 1 minute that you can see within range, detonating it. Each creature within a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on that corpse must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 2d8 necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The size of the explosion increases by 5 feet for every size larger than medium.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"A corpse (destroyed upon casting)","saveDcAbilityId":2,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":true,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[{"fixedValue":null,"id":"spell_24124_16061","entityId":null,"entityTypeId":null,"type":"damage","subType":"necrotic","dice":null,"restriction":"","statId":null,"requiresAttunement":false,"duration":null,"friendlyTypeName":"Damage","friendlySubtypeName":"Necrotic","isGranted":false,"bonusTypes":[],"value":null,"availableToMulticlass":null,"modifierTypeId":0,"modifierSubTypeId":0,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"die":{"diceCount":2,"diceValue":8,"diceMultiplier":null,"fixedValue":null,"diceString":"2d8"},"count":1,"durationUnit":null,"usePrimaryStat":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[{"level":1,"typeId":15,"dice":{"diceCount":1,"diceValue":8,"diceMultiplier":null,"fixedValue":0,"diceString":"1d8"},"value":null,"details":""}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]}}],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spellscale","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":120,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":739089,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":78319,"definitionKey":"1118725998:78319","name":"Contagious Affliction","level":1,"school":"Necromancy","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":10},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

Speaking words of illness and death, you cause a creature's blood to cloud with toxins and their skin to erupt in lesions.  Make a ranged spell attack against one creature within range.  On a hit, the target takes 2d12 poison damage and becomes infected with a contagious affliction.  On a miss the target takes half damage and is not infected.  

\r\n

While the target is infected in this way it is poisoned and it must make a Constitution saving throw at the start of each of its turns, ending this effect on a success.  Each time the target fails a saving throw against this effect, it's affliction erupts in a cloud of disease.  This cloud is a sphere with a radius of 10ft centered on the target, and each creature within this sphere when the target fails its saving throw takes 1d6 poison damage.  

\r\n

This affliction counts as a disease, and can be removed with a Lesser Restoration spell or similar magic.  Undead and constructs are immune to the effects of this spell.  

\r\n

At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the initial poison damage increases by 1d12 for each slot level above 1st and the damage of the poisonous eruptions increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.  Additionally, when you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target takes a -1 penalty to saving throws made against the effects of this spell.  This penalty increases to -2 for a spell slot of 5th level or higher,  -3 for a slot of 7th level or higher, and -4 for a 9th level spell slot.

 You empower an ally's attack with necrotic energy. The damage for the  targeted strike deals an extra 2d8 necrotic damage. In addition the creature that takes this necrotic damage cannot be healed until the end of your next turn.

\r\n

At higher levels: When you use a spell slot of 3rd level or higher the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot used above 2nd.

All food, drink, and crops within a 5-foot radius centered on a point of your choice within range becomes magically contaminated by necrotic energy. The affected substances appear unchanged until they are consumed or the spell is detected by magical means. Any creature that consumes the contaminated food, drink, or crop must make a Constitution saving throw. On failed save, the creature takes 2d8 necrotic damage, or half as a much on successful one. Pulling from poisonous fumes around you, a draft of putrid vapors drifts toward a target creature within range. Choose a target creature, it must make a Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 poison damage and become poisoned for the duration. While poisoned in this way, the creature has disadvantage against all saving throws against poison.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target becomes vulnerable to poison damage until the end of its next turn on a failed save. A creature with resistance or immunity to poison or the poisoned condition is unaffected. For each slot level above 1st, increase the damage by 1d6.

\r\n

Inspired by combat skills from Darkest Dungeon, a dungeon crawl rpg by Red Hook Studios.

A translucent sheath of acid envelops you and your gear, protecting you from harm while damaging your attackers. You gain 2d4 temporary hit points for the duration. If a creature hits you with a melee attack while you have these hit points, the creature takes 2d4 acid damage.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, both the temporary hit points and the acid damage increase by 2d4 for each slot level above 1st.

A creature that you can see within range gets some of is vitality drained and transfered to another creature of your choice.

\r\n

The target creature must suceed on a Constitution saving throw or suffer 2d6 necrotic damamge. On a save the creature suffers only half as much damage. The life force will then be transfered to another creature you can see within 30 feet of the initial target. Such creature heals as many hit points as the necrotic damage suffered by the initial target.

\r\n

This spell has no effect on constructs and undeads.

\r\n

You invoke a horrifying ritual of blood magic, causing a new arm to grow on a humanoid of your choice from the bone you use to cast this spell.

\r\n

The creature can use the arm appendage to make an unarmed melee attack as a bonus action. The attack deals 1d10 plus the target’s strength modifier bludgeoning damage when it hits.

\r\n

Additionally, the creature now has a climb speed equal to its walking speed and has advantage on all strength ability checks while the arm remains in place.

\r\n

When this spell ends, the flesh surrounding the bone that was used deteriorates over 1 round, leaving behind the bone. This spell ends early if the arm is removed from the body.

You transform one of your arms into a writhing tentacle. You can use your new appendage to make a weapon attack with a reach of up to 10ft. You use your spellcasting ability modifier for that attack. The attack deals 2d8 + spellcasting ability modifier damage. On a hit, you may also make a grapple against that creature, using your spellcasting ability modifier for the grapple check. Any equipment held in or on the chosen arm can be dropped on the ground or merged with the tentacle.

\r\n

You cause a creature temporary paralysis by tensing its musculature so as to cause a short period of paralysis. This spell has no effect on undead, constructs or creatures immune to the paralyzed condition. This spell also has no effect on creatures that lack a musculature, such as oozes. Make a melee attack using your spellcasting attack modifier, if it hits the creature must make a constitution saving throw with disadvantage. If the creature fails on the saving throw they are paralyzed for 3 rounds and take 2d10s of psychic damage. Otherwise the target takes 3d6s of psychic damage on a successful save.

You touch an enemy and an irritating rash spreads from the point if contact. The target must make a wisdom saving throw or take 2d8 Psychic damage, have disadvantage on their next attack roll, and lose their reaction until the start of their next turn. 

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":5,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":true,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1549262,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":174336,"definitionKey":"1118725998:174336","name":"Magnify Damage","level":2,"school":"Necromancy","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

A target creature within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become cursed for the duration of this spell.  Choose a damage type.  While cursed, the creature has vulnerability to the chosen damage type if it is not already vulnerable, resistant, or immune to it.  If the creature is resistant to the damage type, it loses that resistance while cursed.

\r\n

At higher levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":5,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":true,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[{"fixedValue":null,"id":"spell_174336_129012","entityId":null,"entityTypeId":null,"type":"vulnerability","subType":"all","dice":null,"restriction":"","statId":null,"requiresAttunement":false,"duration":null,"friendlyTypeName":"Vulnerability","friendlySubtypeName":"All","isGranted":false,"bonusTypes":[],"value":null,"availableToMulticlass":null,"modifierTypeId":0,"modifierSubTypeId":0,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"die":{"diceCount":null,"diceValue":null,"diceMultiplier":null,"fixedValue":null,"diceString":null},"count":1,"durationUnit":null,"usePrimaryStat":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]}}],"conditions":[],"tags":["Damage","Debuff"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":690928,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":72930,"definitionKey":"1118725998:72930","name":"Meat Puppet","level":2,"school":"Necromancy","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

Target one creature that you can see within range and attempt to bind it's limbs with necrotic magic. It must make a constitution saving throw, on a fail the spell takes hold. Creatures immune to being charmed, without limbs or with incorporeal bodies are unaffected by the spell.

\r\n

While under the effects of the spell a creatures movement appears more jerky than usual and they feel an unpleasant crawling sensation beneath the skin.

\r\n

You can use your bonus action to force all creatures effected by the spell to suddenly strike them selves for 1d4 bludgeoning + 1d4 necrotic damage.

\r\n

When a creature effected by your spell makes an attack you can use your reaction to influence the target. The creature must make a constitution check contested by your intelligence or charisma (your choice). If you succeed you choose a new target within range. A redirected attack deals half damage. The new target can be the creature that made the attack. If the contest is a tie, a random target within range is chosen by the DM.

\r\n

On the end of it's turn an effected creature can make a constitution saving throw. On a successful save the creature shrugs off your control. The spell ends when no more creatures are under it's effect (or you lose concentration).

\r\n

At Higher Levels. For each slot level above 2nd both of kinds damage increases by 1d4. For every two slot levels above 2nd you can target one additional creature (levels 4th, 6th and 8th).

You coat one object in a thin layer of steaming acid. The target must fit within a 10 ft. cube. A weapon coated with this acid deals an additional 1d6 acid damage on a hit and ignores any AC bonuses granted by non-magical armor. Whenever an object coated with the acid is hit by an attack, any creature within 5 ft. must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 acid damage.

Make a ranged spell attack against a target creature you can see within range. On a hit, the target’s teeth and gums become infected and their mouth swells and oozes blood and pus. They take 1d10 poison damage. Whenever they attempt to speak (including casting a spell with verbal components), the target must make a Constitution saving throw against your spell DC. On a success they are able to articulate themselves; on a failure their words are garbled and unintelligible.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":2,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":true,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Damage","Control","Debuff"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":147721,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":26316,"definitionKey":"1118725998:26316","name":"Muscle Melt","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":40,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You launch a beam of searing heat at a creature of your choice within range, and attempt to mentally decrease its musculature. The targeted creature must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the targeted creature takes half damage, and does not have its strength score decreased. On a failed save, the creature takes 1d8 fire damage, and its strength score is decreased by the amount that it failed the saving throw by (minimum strength score of 1), for the duration (or until dispelled), and it experiences a visible decrease in musculature for the duration.

\r\n

For example, if your spell save DC is 15 and the targeted creature with a strength of 4 rolls a 12 with modifiers, it takes 1d8 fire damage, and its strength score is now 1.

\r\n

\r\n

Non-magical food and drink within a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on a point is made poisonous. Any creature that eats the food or drink must make a Constitution saving throw or take 3d6 Poison damage and be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, they take an addition 3d6 poison damage at the start of each of their turns. They are allowed a save at the end of each of their turns to end the poisoned condition.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":3,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":true,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[{"fixedValue":null,"id":"spell_149164_110068","entityId":null,"entityTypeId":null,"type":"damage","subType":"poison","dice":null,"restriction":"","statId":null,"requiresAttunement":false,"duration":null,"friendlyTypeName":"Damage","friendlySubtypeName":"Poison","isGranted":false,"bonusTypes":[],"value":null,"availableToMulticlass":null,"modifierTypeId":0,"modifierSubTypeId":0,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"die":{"diceCount":3,"diceValue":6,"diceMultiplier":null,"fixedValue":null,"diceString":"3d6"},"count":1,"durationUnit":null,"usePrimaryStat":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]}}],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1427529,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":157853,"definitionKey":"1118725998:157853","name":"Redistribution","level":2,"school":"Necromancy","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Sight","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

A shadowy, wraith-like orb violently bursts from the chest of your enemy and separates into streams of dark energy that heal your allies. 

\r\n

The caster must have the target within sight. The target must make a CON saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 3d6 necrotic damage; the total damage is split evenly among the caster's allies who are within a 20 ft. radius. On a successful save, the target takes no damage.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 2nd.

Miraculous Necromancy from the Codex of Life. The use of this spell in a campaign assumes that there is a possibility of suffering various forms of permanent injuries that may require medical care or magical healing.

\r\n

You remove one permanent injury from a creature you touch, the injury can be a broken bone, infected wound, dislocated shoulder or a traumatic brain injury. Other injuries can also be removed at the Dungeon Master's discretion. Additionally the creature regains hit points equal to 2d6 + your spell casting ability modifier.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the hit points regained increases by 1d6 and you can remove one additional permanent injury from the creature. For each spell slot of 3rd level or higher the material cost increases by 10 gold pieces.

","snippet":null,"concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"10 gold pieces worth of Obsidian Dust, which the spell consumes.","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":645125,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":68360,"definitionKey":"1118725998:68360","name":"Transfusion","level":1,"school":"Necromancy","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You siphon the life of others trough touch, taking away their blood into an orb then transfusing it to you and your allies. Make a melee spell attack against a creature within your reach. On a hit, the target takes 1d6 necrotic damage, and you store the hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt. Until the spell ends, you can transfer those hit points to a target or make the attack again on each of your turns as an action, each attack adds up to the amount saved.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1rd.

Until the spell ends you transform yourself into a ghoul-like beast, your flesh peeling away and your nails becoming talons.

\r\n

When a beast, celestial, fey, giant, or humanoid type creature starts its turn within 5 ft. of you or when it moves to a space within 5 ft. of you for the first time on its turn, it must make a Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of you until the start of its next turn. If a creature successfully saves against the effect, it is immune for the next hour. In addition your unarmed strike deals 1d6 + ability score mod slashing damage, and has the finesse property.

Choose a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a constitution saving throw or take 2d6  necrotic damage. At the start of each of its turns the target takes another 2d6 necrotic damage. The target can make another constitution saving throw at the end of its turn. On a success, the spell ends.

\r\n

If the target dies while the spell is active they explode in a spray of blood, flesh and bones. All creatures within 5ft of the target must make a  dexterity save. A creature takes 2d6 necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much on a success.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. The damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 2nd

As a reaction, after an Ally uses a melee attack against a target, You project an illusion into the mind of the target that makes them believe one of their appendages has been cut off by the Ally. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of the Ally for the duration.

\r\n

While frightened by this spell, a creature must take the Dash action and move away from the Ally by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move. If the creature ends its turn in a location where it doesn't have line of on your ally,The  frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, On a successful save, the spell ends for that creature.

Your ability to manipulate blood allows you to infuse yourself with it, even using the blood of others to renew your own vitality. When a creature you can see within range dies, regain 2d4+ your spellcasting modifier of hit points. This does not work for undead or constructs. 

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can add 1d4 healing for each slot level above 1st.

A line of billowing gas 30 feet long and 5 feet wide emanates from you in a direction you choose.  Each creature in the line must make a Constitution saving throw.  On a failed save, a creature takes 2d10 poison damage and is poisoned for 1 round.  On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't poisoned.  A creature that doesn't need to breathe is immune to this spell, and a creature that is holding its breath when you cast the spell has advantage on the saving throw. 

\r\n

At Higher Levels.  When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 2nd.

As you hold your hands in front of you, a green mist shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The acid can eat through objects in the area that aren’t being worn or carried.

atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1941871,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":219098,"definitionKey":"1118725998:219098","name":"Noxious Cloud","level":2,"school":"Evocation","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Round","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":10},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

In your hand you gather a ball of toxic magic and hurl it at a point you can see within range, where it explodes into a cloud of deadly miasma.  Each creature within 10ft of that point must make a Constitution saving throw.  A creature takes 3d6 poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.  A creature must repeat this saving throw when it enters the cloud for the first time on a turn or when it ends its turn within the cloud. 

\r\n

The cloud lasts until the end of your next turn or until it is dispersed by a strong wind.  Creatures and objects within the cloud are lightly obscured. 

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 2nd.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"Amanita mushrooms and nightshade ,{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":8067,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":3159,"definitionKey":"1118725998:3159","name":"Monochromatic Orb","level":1,"school":"Necromancy","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":90,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"
    \r\n
  • You hurl a small sphere of polarized energy at a creature that you can see within range. You may choose radiant or necrotic for the type of orb you create, and then make a ranged spell attack against the target. If the attack hits, the creature takes 3d8 damage of the type you chose.
    • \r\n
  • Alternatively, you can choose to deal both damage types at once, dealing instead half of 3d8 damage each radiant and necrotic. Because that destabilizes the spell somewhat, the damage should be rounded down. In the rare case where the ranged spell attack is a natural 20 on the die, round the damage up instead.
    • \r\n
\r\n

Casting at Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot above 1st.

\r\n
\r\n

\"Glad to have found a way to make use of his diamond tainted during his trip through the Shadowfell, the mage hurriedly put his newest creation to the test. Gathering a mix of positive and negative energy in the darkened gem, he pronounced a short incantation. A destructive, black-white orb zipped past the dilapidated orrery on his desk, swiftly disintegrating the makeshift target hanging from the wall...\"

\r\n
\r\n

You touch a willing creature, imparting them with a fragment of possibility. A small ethereal bead floats into the creature's head, and last the duration or until dispelled.

\r\n

After a creature with the fragment of possibility makes an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, they can expend the fragment of possibility to roll another d20 and use either result. Alternatively when an attack roll is made against the creature with the fragment of possibility, the creature can expend the fragment of possibility to force the creature to roll another d20 and use the lower of the two rolls.

\r\n

A creature cannot possess more than one fragment of possibility at any given time.

The gravity in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you can see within range increases for a moment. Each creature in the sphere on the turn when you cast the spell must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 force damage, and its speed is halved until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no reduction to its speed.

\r\n

Until the start of your next turn, any object that isn’t being worn or carried in the sphere requires a successful Strength check against your spell save DC to pick up or move.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

\r\n

l":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":5137126,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":630031,"definitionKey":"1118725998:630031","name":"Immovable Object (Homebrew)","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You touch an object that weighs no more than 10 pounds and cause it to become magically fixed in place. You and the creatures you designate when you cast this spell can move the object normally. You can also set a password that, when spoken within 5 feet of the object, suppresses this spell for 1 minute.

\r\n

If the object is fixed in the air, it can hold up to 4,000 pounds of weight. More weight causes the object to fall. Otherwise, a creature can use an action to make a Strength check against your spell save DC. On a success, the creature can move the object up to 10 feet.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the DC to move the object increases by 5, it can carry up to 8,000 pounds of weight, and the duration increases to 24 hours. If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the DC to move the object increases by 10, it can carry up to 20,000 pounds of weight, and the effect is permanent until dispelled.

consumes","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[{"level":4,"typeId":3,"dice":null,"value":0,"details":"24 can carry up to 20,000 pounds"}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Utility","Dunamancy"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":5137145,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":630036,"definitionKey":"1118725998:630036","name":"Wristpocket (Homebrew)","level":2,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You flick your wrist, causing one object in your hand to vanish. The object, which only you can be holding and can weigh no more than 5 pounds, is transported to an extradimensional space, where it remains for the duration.

\r\n
