","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Utility","Dunamancy"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":421970,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":40820,"definitionKey":"1118725998:40820","name":"Age/Rewind Object","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":5,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

School: Chronomancy (Transmutation)
(Intended for use with the Chronomancer subclass)

\r\n

Age Object:
As the caster focuses on the object or area, they determine a volume in cubic inches they wish to affect.  Every second they concentrate, the non-living material inside the volume either ages or moves through time at a rate of (caster level x 1000) / (2 x cubic volume) days per second.  An example here would be an 8-cubic-inch padlock aged by a level 3 caster for a full 5 minutes would advance a maximum of ~150 years.  A level 20 caster doing the same would advance it ~1000 years.  A level 20 caster attempting to age a child-sized statue (2500 cubic inches) for 5 minutes would age it 800 days.
NOTE: The minimum dimension that can be used in this calculation is 1/2 an inch, so a 8.5 x 11 inch piece of paper, for example, which normally has a thickness of 0.004 inches, can at the very least be calculated as 8.5 x 11 x 0.5 inches, yielding 46.75 cubic inches, NOT 8.5 x 11 x 0.004 inches, which would have yielded 0.374 cubic inches.

\r\n

Rewind Object:
Attempting to reverse the age of the item instead yields half the results.  This spell only works on non-living material, as time potential is much greater (and thus harder to alter) where living beings are involved (even more so as their agency or potential for influence increases).

\r\n

Casting Modes:
There are two \"modes\", or mind-frames, in which this spell may be cast.  It is simplest to think about this difference in the following way: cast the spell targeting a volume of MATTER, or cast the spell targeting a volume of SPACE.

\r\n

In the former case, the subjective and causal passage of time from the matter's perspective is altered.  Time begins to accelerate, causing the reactions, wear and tear, loss or expenditure, and increase of entropy to affect the matter itself.  Metal could rust, and crumble.  Bread could mold, flowers wither, silver tarnish, a lit log burn to charcoal, etc.  In the reverse form, the spell causes the subjective flow of time to be reversed, rust or broken metal reforming and renewing, moldy food returning to freshness, dead flowers returning, etc.  This is the only \"safe\" form in which this spell can be cast (base 0% chance of a disturbance to the demiplane of time, no chance of paradox), and this is the only functionality this spell can ever have if cast by any magic user other than a Chronomancer (who do not understand the far more advanced details of space and time's codependent relationship).

\r\n

In the latter case, a fixed volume of space is focused upon and -like the window on a slide-rule- is temporally slid forward or backward through time.  This region of space can be anything the Chronomancer decides; the space bounded by a wine bottle, or by a window frame, or immediately surrounding a page of paper, for example.  The contents within the volume of space change to reflect what WAS/WILL BE inside that space at the point in time the spell moves the slider to.  Words on a page that are most likely to be written may appear if sliding forward; or if already written, will disappear if rolled far enough back.  A seemingly-\"empty\" region of space, such as a shattered window-frame, may suddenly fill with intact glass if rolled back to a point when they were undamaged; or if rolled forward, a perfectly fine window may shatter because a rock will be thrown through it in the future (or, may stay completely intact, just gaining some grime, if nothing ever goes on to break the window in the future...)

\r\n

Higher Level Slots:
For each level of spell slot expended above level 2, add another effective caster level when calculating effect, and increase chance of temporal disturbance to the demiplane of time by 5%

\r\n

This spell is an original work.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"A chunk of rust OR a baby tooth from any creature","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"characterlevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1207675,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":132697,"definitionKey":"1118725998:132697","name":"Alacritic Casting","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":10,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

School: Chronomancy (Transmutation)
(Intended for use with the Chronomancer subclass)

\r\n

Rules Note: This spell is intended to allow the caster to ignore both the RAW restrictions and the errata ruling which, under normal circumstances, prevent more than one non-Cantrip spell from being cast per round.  While this spell is in effect, each Action, Reaction, and Bonus Action available to the caster each round may be used to cast a qualifying spell of any affected level.  Consult with your DM for a final ruling in your game.

\r\n

Alacritc Casting allows you to speed up the casting time of your spells of 5th level and lower. Only spells that are cast within Alacritic Casting's duration are affected. The end result of this is that you may use 2 Reactions total per turn so long as both Reactions are used only to cast Reaction-time spells of an effected level. You gain one additional Bonus Action per turn which may only be used to cast a Bonus-time spell of an effected level.  You also gain one additional Action per turn which may only be used to cast a spell of an effected level. Finally, the casting times for effected-level spells, whose normal casting times are longer than 1 Action, are reduced by 20%.

\r\n

Effect on Caster Per Round:
Normal amount of actions, and
+1 Bonus Action for a Bonus Action spell
+1 Reaction for a Reaction spell
+1 Reaction for a Reaction spell
+1 Action for any spell
Spells with casting time > 1 Action are reduced by 20% of original casting time

\r\n

The material component is a miniature hourglass which is destroyed when the spell is cast.

\r\n

At Higher Levels:
For every 2 additional levels of spell slot expended to cast this spell, spells of 1 level higher will be effected.  So, a 4th level slot will effect 6th level and lower spells; a 6th level slot will effect 7th level and lower spells; and an 8th level slot will effect 8th level and lower spells.

\r\n

Loosely inspired by a 2e AD&D Wizard spell.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"A tiny hourglass, which is destroyed during casting.","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"2","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":4778910,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":583521,"definitionKey":"1118725998:583521","name":"Conjure Portable Forge","level":2,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":4,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":10},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

A 10-foot-diameter wide forge appears in an unoccupied space in front of you. The forge stays for 4 hours, or until dispelled manually or when you lose concentration. The forge cannot be moved by any means. It has an AC of 17 and 20 hitpoints. If the forge is destroyed forcefully, you cannot conjure it again for 1d4 + 1 days.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 4 hours for each slot level above 2nd.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"a bit of tallow, a pinch of brimstone, and a dusting of powdered iron","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spellscale","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":10},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":4471277,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":543295,"definitionKey":"1118725998:543295","name":"Arcane Forensics","level":2,"school":"Divination","duration":{"durationInterval":10,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":"Cone","aoeValue":30},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

For the duration, you see the presence of residual magic in a 30 feet cone in front of you. While concentrating, you can use your action to focus on the different particles around any visible creature, object or area that appears to have been affected by a spell in the last 24 hours. You learn its school of magic, if any, and the types of components (verbal, somatic, material) used to cast it.

\r\n

If the residual magic is caused by a creature's innate spellcasting ability, you instead learn the creature's type (fiend, celestial, construct, etc.).

\r\n

You can also determine when such magic was used by the density of particles left in the area. Any spells or magical phenomenon that occurred more than 24 hours prior to casting this spell cannot be detected.

\r\n

Finally, you can make Intelligence (Arcana) checks against the responsible creature or magic item's spell save DC to determine the spell used. If the magical phenomenon is not caused by a creature or item, for example a divine intervention or planar anomaly, the DC is left at the DM's discretion.

\r\n

You focus on a creature, an object or a scenery that you can seen and absorb the moment, which you transfert on a scroll, a canvas or any surface of your choice that is no bigger than 1 square feet. 

You create a perfect image of whichever sight you focuses on. The image lasts until dispelled.

\r\n

At higher levels. If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the surface upon which you can transfert an image increases by 5 square feet for each slot level above 1st.

You attempt to peer into the mind of a humanoid you can see within range before casting disguise self. It must make a Wisdom saving throw, and does so with advantage if you or your companions are fighting it. If it fails the saving throw, you get peer into the mind of the target and see a person of their past who they care for the most, who was their most feared enemy, their hero, their most loved one, etc. If it succeeds the saving throw, the creature knows you tried to peer into it's mind.

\r\n

When appearing as a favored person from their past, you get advantage on persuasion or intimidation checks (depending on the person you disguise yourself to be).

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":5,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"2","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":true,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Social","Utility","Deception"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":3},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":3752944,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":451069,"definitionKey":"1118725998:451069","name":"Hamund's Harvesting Hands","level":1,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Until Dispelled"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

Target a dead creature within range that has a CR of 3 or less. This spell conjures an invisible pair of hands that harvest a creature for any useful materials as listed in their harvesting table. No ability check is required to harvest these materials, the hands automatically succeed in harvesting them, and then place them next to the creatures carcass. You still need to provide any requisite containers such as vials or bags, but the hands harvest all materials in half the time it would normally take. You may direct the hands to harvest certain materials first. Once all of the creature's useful materials have been harvested, the hands disappear.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the CR of the creature harvestable increases by 3 for each slot level above 1st.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2,3],"componentsDescription":"a sharp knife and a pair of gloves","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[{"level":1,"typeId":12,"dice":null,"value":0,"details":"When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the CR of the creature harvestable increases by 3 for each slot level above 1st."}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spellscale","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":3834850,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":461615,"definitionKey":"1118725998:461615","name":"Murmur's Massive Mending","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":10,"durationUnit":"Round","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":10,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":120,"aoeType":"Cylinder","aoeValue":5},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

As you cast the spell, you draw a transmutation circle on the ground up to 5 ft in diameter, and select a time up to 5 years in the past using the pocket watch. 

\r\n

This spell attempts to reconstitute entities of your choice within a 5-foot-high cylinder centred on the transmutation circle (The cylinder diameter is defined by the transmutation circle) to the state they were in at a select time in the past.

\r\n

Once the spell has been cast, the entities will be repaired over the next minute. This process can only be stopped if the transmutation circle is dispelled. If the caster concentrates on the spell for it's duration, they can choose materials that they can see within range equivalent to double the material missing from the entities. These materials are consumed by the spell over it's duration. If the caster is not concentrating on the spell or chooses incorrect/insufficient materials, the transmutation circle pulls in compatible material from within 120 ft. If no material is found, the spell fails, and your pocket watch breaks. It can be repaired over a long rest.

\r\n

The spell cannot extract materials from an unwilling creature or restore magic to an entity.

\r\n

As part of the casting, make a spellcasting ability check. This will determine what materials can be transmuted by the spell. A check of 20 is required to reproduce complex information such as writing or artwork.

\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n
MaterialDifficulty
Cloth, Paper, RopeDC 6
Crystal, Glass, IceDC 8
Wood, BoneDC 10
StoneDC 13
Iron, SteelDC 17
MithralDC 21
AdamantineDC 25
\r\n

If a creature starts it's turn in the path of the repair process, it must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking up to 2d10 force damage (At the DM's discretion) on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the casting time increases by 10 minutes, the inflicted necrotic/force damage is increased by 1d10, the height of the cylinder and maximum diameter of the transmutation circle increase by 15 ft, and the maximum time displacement of the target state is doubled, for each slot level above 1st.

\r\n

A note on material compatibility. The materials used must have come from the same raw material as that which you are trying to repair. For example, you can reconstitute the missing half of an iron banded barrel using a broken wooden bookshelf, and an iron sword. Mending living entities can be tricky as the only compatible material is other parts of that same entity. When reconstituting part of a living entity using another part of it’s form, they receive no healing, instead taking 4d10 necrotic damage (Halved if the caster is concentrating on the spell). “Sometimes it's worth losing a hand to reattach an arm.”

You bend space around you and manifest it as a small ornate disk orbiting near your head. When you look through the disk your view is magnified up to 100 times of normal vision range.

\r\n

Here is a list of examples you may use the disk for:

\r\n
    \r\n
  • You can study the sky and the planets.
    • \r\n
  • You can identify the face of a person from up to two miles away.
    • \r\n
  • You can read letters in a book from a distance of 1000ft.
    • \r\n
  • You can see the most meticulous details of an object from up close.
    • \r\n
\r\n

You still need to have a clear vision to perceive anything, as this spell does not allow you to see through any obscurements. Additionally, any spells you cast with a range of 60ft or greater have their range increased by 30ft when cast looking through the disk.

You form a bubble of acid in your palm that you can use to remove the flesh from a corpse. Doing so takes time but leaves the skeleton cleaned and intact. 

\r\n

A spell created by the necromancer Volund, who hoped to expedite the process of obtaining skeletons to raise for service as he felt zombies were idiotic to raise. 

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":3140323,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":371311,"definitionKey":"1118725998:371311","name":"Adventuring Clone","level":2,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":30,"durationUnit":"Day","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

This spell summons an exact copy of a humanoid. In order for the spell to work the target must be willing or fail a charisma save. The target of this spell lays in one coffin and the clone is summoned into the other empty coffin within 10 feet. The silver thread connects the two coffins. The target is put into a coma as their spirit moves into the clone. The clone has all the same statistics, skills and memories of the original. The clone is summoned with mundane copies of all the original targets items. When the clone is killed, dies, or the spell duration expires the clone vanishes and the targets spirit returns to their original body with all of the memories and experience of the clone but none of the newly acquired items or injuries.

\r\n

When cast at higher level:

\r\n

If cast as a third level spell the duration is two months. If cast as a fourth level spell the duration is three months. If cast as a fifth level spell the duration is six months. If cast as a sixth level spell the duration is one year.  At seventh level, five years. At eighth level, ten years. If cast as a ninth level spell the duration is permanent.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"Two coffins no more than 10 feet apart and ten feet of silver thread.","saveDcAbilityId":6,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":true,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1233938,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":135878,"definitionKey":"1118725998:135878","name":"Alatir’s Extradimensional Expansion","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":8,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You touch the wall of a room no bigger than 20 feet by 20 feet.  The room becomes an extradimentional space and its interior triples in size.  Any nonmagical amenities in the room also triple (beds, wardrobes, chairs, etc.) for the duration but cannot leave the room.

\r\n

If this spell is cast on the same room every day for a year it becomes permanent.

\r\n

At higher levels this spell's room size maximum increases 10 feet by 10 feet for each level above 2nd.

\r\n
\r\n

\"This is your best room?!  No, no, I can make it work.  Just bring me a few more pillows alright?\" ~Alatir the Artisan

\r\n
\r\n

 

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2,3],"componentsDescription":"Two identical sliver mirrors worth at least 50gp each","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":666418,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":70720,"definitionKey":"1118725998:70720","name":"Alter Voice","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You alter the voice of one creature you can see that is within range. You can cause the voice to change accent, gender, tone, quality, or even to perfectly resemble a voice you have heard before if speaking. The spell has no affect on what the target chooses to say only the sound of the voice when they speak. You cannot change speech into other sounds like barks or music or alter what they say: if they speak, the words remain the same and likewise you cannot change a bark or growl into words but you can make a bark sound like a squeak or a bird's call sound like a monstrous roar and similar such things. There is an exception: if a creature targeted by this spell is normally capable of speech but cannot due to a physical restriction such as damage to vocal chords or a Druid's Wild Shape form this spell allows them to speak as long as they retain the mental capacity for it (since a creature's mental statistics are replaced this exception does not apply to those affected by Polymorph).

\r\n

You can use this spell to render a creature voiceless: a person becomes unable to speak, dogs cannot bark, etc. rendering the target silent. A target silenced by this effect cannot provide verbal components of spells.

\r\n

An unwilling creature targeted by this spell must succeed on a Constitution saving throw to avoid the spell. Any target affected by this spell can, if they wish, make Constitution saving throw at the end of their turns to end the spell effect on them on success.

\r\n

At higher levels. When you cast this spell using a 2nd level spell slot or higher you can target an additional creature within range for each level above 1st level.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":3,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":true,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[{"level":1,"typeId":1,"dice":null,"value":1,"details":""}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Control","Communication","Social","Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spellscale","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":5173379,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":634625,"definitionKey":"1118725998:634625","name":"Aphasia","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

A creature of your choice must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failure they lose the ability to understand one language of your choice in all aspects, thus hindering their ability to communicate and understand their comrades. In addition, creatures under the effects of this spell are unable to use \"Verbal\" components to cast spells. At the end of their turn they may make another Saving Throw. Creatures succeeding the saving throw are aware a spell was cast on them. 

\r\n


At higher levels:  you may target one additional creature for every spell slot used above the first.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"a snake's tongue tied in a knot","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[{"level":1,"typeId":11,"dice":null,"value":0,"details":""}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Social","Debuff","Utility","Combat"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spellscale","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":5107340,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":625740,"definitionKey":"1118725998:625740","name":"Arcane Gift","level":2,"school":"Enchantment","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You touch one willing creature who uses magic with your arcane focus. You transfer your spell slot to them, allowing them an extended use of magic.

\r\n

The way this exchange of magic works is as follows: in exchange for the spell slot you use to cast this spell, that creature regains a spell slot of the same level that they have already expended.  Alternatively, the creature can gain spell slots of lower level whose sum equals the level at which this spell is cast.

\r\n

For example, casting this as a 3rd level spell, the creature can gain a 3rd level spell, a 2nd level and a 1st level spell, or three 1st level spells.

\r\n

No creature can use this spell to regain more spell slots than they already have per level.  If this is cast at 6th level but the recipient has only used a 1st level spell slot, they can only regain that slot, nothing more.

\r\n

At higher levels, the sum of the spell slots a creature can gain is equal to the spell slot expended to cast this spell.

You conjure a bolt or arcane energy which splits into 3 spectral aircraft. they have 1HP and AC equal to your spell save DC each.

\r\n

Scout: All aircraft will patrol for enemies in a 250ft. sphere centered on the caster, the aircraft have a passive perception equal to the caster's save DC, reporting when they sight creatures of CR 1/2 or greater (they will report the number and species of the creatures) 

\r\n

At higher levels: and the scouting range increases by 250ft. for each spell level above 1.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"a paper airplane","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1.2","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Detection","Utility","Exploration"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":250,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":4443881,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":539855,"definitionKey":"1118725998:539855","name":"Arcane Stealth","level":2,"school":"Illusion","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

For the duration while concentrating on this spell, you may cast any other spell without the Verbal or Somatic components normally required by that spell.   If you use Arcane Stealth to cast another concentration spell without it's verbal or somatic components, the new spell works, but concentration on Arcane Stealth is broken.

\r\n

The verbal and somatic components of the Arcane Stealth spell are very subtle -- creatures within 15 feet of the spellcaster have disadvantage on ability checks to discern its casting and beyond that range, they fail automatically. However, as with any other spell with verbal and somatic components, this spell cannot be cast if the spellcaster cannot make sound (such as in the area of effect of a silence spell) or does not have free use of at least one hand.  

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1.2","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Social","Detection","Utility","Deception"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":4526024,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":550715,"definitionKey":"1118725998:550715","name":"Astral Bookshelf","level":1,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":10,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

A medium sized 3ft by 3ft bookshelf materializes in front of the caster. For the duration of the spell you may take an action to add or remove books from the bookshelf. When the bookshelf is dispelled all books on the shelf are safely transported into an extra dimensional space.

The bookshelf can hold 27 tomes or 54 small books/pamphlets.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"focus, bound to the bookshelf","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Summoning","Teleportation","Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":10,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":2307303,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":263480,"definitionKey":"1118725998:263480","name":"Azure Torch","level":2,"school":"Evocation","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":5,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":true,"description":"

Caster snaps fingers in front of pointed index and middle fingers of the other hand. Small flame bursts from snap and ignites 6in blue jet of flame from the caster's fingers. This flame can be used to cut or weld metal. 

\r\n

May use as melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d6 fire damage. If torch is held to target for entire round uninterrupted additional 1d6 fire damage, and may consider their next attack with the torch a hit if they choose to continue burning their victim, which uses their action. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

\r\n

When you reach 5th level may use bonus action to light Azure Torch in other hand without the use of a spell slot.

\r\n

This spell's damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 11th level (2d6), 17th level (3d6).

After drawing a rectangle on a plain surface, you can create a magical screen inside the shape. On this screen, you can display any event which you know or remember of.
The images are animated and silent. You can also increase or decrease the speed of the images. If you don't know the exact looks of a person or object present in the projection, it appears as a blurred figure.

\r\n

You can end the spell as a bonus action.

\r\n

 

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"any type of chalk ","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Communication","Social","Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":4086694,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":495179,"definitionKey":"1118725998:495179","name":"Blightwood's Lightened Load","level":1,"school":"Enchantment","duration":{"durationInterval":8,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Sight","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

This spell when cast, will allow any armor to be worn comfortably for the duration. This allows for armor to be worn overnight, preventing exhaustion when awoken. This spell can be cast up to 8 people at a time and will last for the duration.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"A small piece of Cotton","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1.2a","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Sight","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":2109733,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":238981,"definitionKey":"1118725998:238981","name":"Boundless Athenaeum","level":2,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":4,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":10,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You use chalk to inscribe arcana sigils upon a wall or vertical surface. At the completion of the casting, a 10 ft. x 10 ft. portal opens up within the space of the sigils, leading into an extradimensional library unique to the caster. Any objects created by this spell dissipate into smoke if removed from the library, and when the spell ends, any creatures inside the extradimensional space are expelled into the open spaces nearest to the entrance, as well as any objects other than books or other reading materials. While this portal remains open, the library and everything within it appears to be on the same plane of existence as the portal. 

The library is well lit, and always at a comfortable temperature. Decor is chosen by the caster at the time of casting, and can include desks, writing tables, and shelves. The library is never smaller than a 10 ft. x 10 ft. room, but will grow to accommodate any number of books added to it.

\r\n

 

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"A piece of chalk, and a key made of precious metals worth at least 25 gp.","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Utility","Exploration"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":10,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":3322233,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":394354,"definitionKey":"1118725998:394354","name":"Cauterize Memory","level":2,"school":"Enchantment","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Special"},"activation":{"activationTime":10,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

With this special ten-minute long ritual you can remove some of another willing creature's most recent memories: generally allowing for the removal of a traumatic event, an unintentionally learned secret, or some kind of dark thought. Together you--and your willing participant--must mutually decide what portions of the last 24 hours are removed from the target's memories.

\r\n

If the ritual ends before you have finished, the target's memories aren't altered. Otherwise, the memories vanish when the spell ends and the target is incapable of forming memories for a period equal to what was just removed. This generally manifests as a gap or period of unaccounted for unconsciousness and is highly disconcerting for targets who do not retain prior memory of how this spell functions.

\r\n

A greater restoration spell cast on the target restores the creature's memory.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"a simple penduction, like a length of metallic chain or pocket watch","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Social","Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":10,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":5162250,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":633232,"definitionKey":"1118725998:633232","name":"Clara's Eavesdrop","level":2,"school":"Divination","duration":{"durationInterval":10,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":120,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You create a sensor within range in a location familiar to you (a place you have visited or seen before) or in an obvious location that is unfamiliar to you (such as behind a door, around a corner, or in a grove of trees). The sensor stays in place for the duration of the spell. The sensor cannot be attacked or otherwise interacted with.

\r\n

When you cast the spell, you only hear things from your sensor's point of hearing as if you were in its space. As your action, you can switch between your hearing and the sensor's hearing.

\r\n

The sensor is invisible. A creature that can see the sensor (such as a creature benefiting from see invisibility or truesight) sees a luminous sphere around the size of a button.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2,3],"componentsDescription":"A copper earring worth at least 10gp.","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1.0.0","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Scrying","Detection","Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":120,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":771134,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":82105,"definitionKey":"1118725998:82105","name":"Clean Air","level":2,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":2,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":20},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You create a 20 foot sphere of pure air that removes all poison, fog, or other harmful air effects. This allows you to breathe where it would otherwise not be possible. This will not destroy water or materials. The spell effect ends if the radius is filled.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the pure air increases by 20 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"Sprig of Mint","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[{"level":1,"typeId":9,"dice":null,"value":20,"details":""}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Control","Utility","Environment"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spellscale","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":20},"activation":{"activationTime":2,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":3931406,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":474178,"definitionKey":"1118725998:474178","name":"Climate Adaptation (Homebrew)","level":1,"school":"Enchantment","duration":{"durationInterval":24,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Sight","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

Choose up to 10 creatures that you can see

\r\n

A creature under the effect of this spell can is treated as resistant to Extreme Hot and Extreme Cold environments. They are not however granted resistance to Fire or Cold Damage whilst under this spell.

\r\n

This spell also does not grant the ability to breathe underwater, nor does it solve the strain of extreme altitudes. This simply solves the problem of extreme temperatures.

\r\n
\r\n

The Homebrew title is just for relevancy within my own campaigns, for the DM to decide whether or not to allow the spell.

\r\n

You can spend time memorizing words and images. When you cast this spell, you must spend time studying the object you wish to memorize. The time is based upon the type of object:

\r\n

Images and Maps: 1 Minute
Documents: 10 Minutes
Books: 1 Hour

\r\n

Once you have memorized an object, you will not forget it, and can recall it with perfect clarity whenever you need to.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2,3],"componentsDescription":"a sapphire worth at least 25gp","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":8},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":37845,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":8783,"definitionKey":"1118725998:8783","name":"Create Campsite","level":2,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":10,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You create a squadron of tiny unseen servants that create a campsite for you and your companions. They will clear the land of debris, set up tents and bedrolls, start a fire, fetch water and even begin cooking (although they are not particularly good cooks). They cannot create the materials needed for the campsite; the can only use what is available to them in the immediate area and what you and your companions have brought. These servants have no other abilities.

\r\n

Appears in the complete Tome of Spells.

\r\n

 

","snippet":null,"concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"a bit of string, a bit of wood and a drop of water","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Summoning","Social","Utility","Environment"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1873129,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":211149,"definitionKey":"1118725998:211149","name":"Crystal recorder","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":20},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

When casting this spell the caster starts a crystaline spindel to spin.  as long as the caster concentrates the crystal will keep spinning, and while it does, all sound that can be heard at that location is recorded, and the crystal then becomes opaque with a small rune mark appearing at the top.  the change is perminant as is the recording (subject to the crystal not being broken).

\r\n

once the created the crystal can then be used as a focus for illusionary magics to allow the sounds to be played back. the illusion spell used to play back effects how it works, minor illusion allows a quiet playback, phantasmal force - silent playback for the target of the spell, larger illusions can give more powerful volumes and control (for example fast forwarding and rewinding).

\r\n

While the playback is illusionary, it is also verbatum, however people may not believe that it is real even though it will always be the same each time.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2,3],"componentsDescription":"Spindel cut crystal, min value of 10gp","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Social","Scrying","Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":20},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":2274636,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":260091,"definitionKey":"1118725998:260091","name":"Detect Metal","level":1,"school":"Divination","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":60},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You become aware of the location and form of metal within 60 ft of you. A creature wearing or carrying any metal cannot benefit from being invisible from you. The spell can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"a lodestone","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[{"type":2,"conditionId":8,"conditionDuration":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","exception":""}],"tags":["Debuff","Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":60},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":554874,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":58087,"definitionKey":"1118725998:58087","name":"Discretion Bubble","level":1,"school":"Evocation","duration":{"durationInterval":10,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":10},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

A 10-foot-radius invisible and immobile dome springs into existence around and above you and remains stationary for the duration. The hemisphere includes a floor. The spell ends if you leave its area.

Nine creatures of Medium size or smaller can fit inside the dome with you. The spell fails if its area includes a larger creature or more than nine creatures. Any sound made from within the dome can only be heard by the creatures inside the dome, while sound coming from outside the dome can still be heard from within. 

\r\n

The dome doesn't prevent spellcasting or offer any other protection. 

\r\n

 

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"a small crystal bead","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":10},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":3710275,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":446180,"definitionKey":"1118725998:446180","name":"Dowsing Chain","level":1,"school":"Divination","duration":{"durationInterval":2,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":3},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

A phantom chain with a small ball-like weight appears in the caster's hand. The weight and chain act like a dowsing rod, helping the user locate objects or individuals. The spell caster must state their intent when casting the spell, such as what or who they are trying to locate.

\r\n

If trying to locate a person, the target will make a Dexterity (Stealth) check. In order to remain hidden the check must exceed the caster's Save DC. If the check fails, the spell will be able to locate the target. If it succeeds, the target will remain hidden and the spell will fail.

Once conjured the ball and chain will begin to sway slowly, and as the holder moves closer to their target it will move faster and faster. Once directly next to or standing over their target, the ball will stop moving completely. 

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":2,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":true,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Scrying","Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":3},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1606027,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":181413,"definitionKey":"1118725998:181413","name":"Ekeli's Borrowed Understanding","level":2,"school":"Divination","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":15,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You reach out with your mind towards a willing creature within 15 feet and borrow the creatures understanding. Until the spell ends you are proficient in any armor, weapon, tool, ability, and saving throw the creature is proficient in as long as you remain within 60ft of the creature.

School: Chronomancy (Transmutation)
(Intended for use with a Chronomancer subclass such as the School of Temporal Magic)

\r\n

You permanently halt the decay of any nonliving organic matter. The substance must first be placed in a closed container no larger than 1 foot on any side and weigh no more than 10 pounds. This spell is dispelled when the container is unsealed.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2,3],"componentsDescription":"a pinch volcanic ash and an appropriate container, which can be reused after dispelling the spell","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1765866,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":198692,"definitionKey":"1118725998:198692","name":"Forge Fire","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":8,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":10,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You touch an object of Medium size or smaller or a section of an object no more than 5 feet in any dimension.

\r\n

If the material of the object touched is metal or glass, the material is heated it to a workable state. This spell is sometimes the only way to work with certain rarer metals such as Mithril or Adamantine. The metal or glass remains in a workable state for as long as you work on it, no more than 8 hours. [Item]Smith's Tools[/Item] or [Item]Glassblower's Tools[/Item] are still required to work the material.
If the material of the object touched is unfired clay, this spell acts as a kiln, firing the clay and hardening it.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"A lump of coal","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"2","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Creation","Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":10,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":177707,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":23782,"definitionKey":"1118725998:23782","name":"Forget","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You affect the short-term memories of a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed a Wisdom saving throw or completely forget what transpired during the last minute, as if waking up from a dream. The spell does not affect a person’s abilities, only their recent memories. Forget in no way negates any charm, suggestions, geases, quests, or similar spells, but it is possible that the creature who caused such magic to be placed upon the victim of a forget spell could be forgotten by this means.

\r\n

A greater restoration spell restores the lost memories.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the number of forgotten minutes increases by 1d4 for each spell slot above 3rd level.
