You and up to three willing creatures you can see within range become enshrouded in obscurity, rendering your speech as senseless noise to passersby. When a creature hears this, it hears only the din of a crowd speaking. A creature hearing this noise can make a Wisdom (Insight) check contested by your spell save DC. On a success, the creature knows that this noise is being caused by a spell.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

\r\n

You distort the pull of gravity on an object. Touch a medium or smaller object that is not being worn or carried. For the duration, it is considered to be half of its normal weight. Furthermore, if it falls, it does so at a rate of 120 meters per round, taking half damage upon landing. Alternatively, you may increase the weight of the object. If you do so, it is considered to be twice as heavy as normal, and falls twice as quickly. If it does fall, it takes twice as much damage from the impact.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2,3],"componentsDescription":"a lodestone","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1046681,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":113302,"definitionKey":"1118725998:113302","name":"Joshua's Pocket Library","level":1,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You create small pocket dimension. It can be used to store pens, quills, ink bottles, parchment, books, scrolls, or other written material. This pocket dimension is accessible to you and only you through any container, though the opening of the container must be large enough to allow the item to pass through it. This small pocket dimension contains no air and may only to used to store these sorts of items. The spell caster upon casting the spell has access to this pocket dimension for up to 1 hour and can use it to store written or writing materials or to retrieve any such items previously place there. This may store any number of such items however, after the first 20 items the caster must make a Intelligence or Wisdom DC 15 check (increasing by 1 for every 5 extra items) to see if they can find what they are looking for. On a fail they either give up or pull out a random item.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,3],"componentsDescription":"A small empty pouch or bag(not consumed)","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"5e","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Creation","Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"characterlevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1348506,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":148875,"definitionKey":"1118725998:148875","name":"Listening Coin","level":2,"school":"Divination","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You create a magical link between two similar coins, turning them into a magical listening device. One coin becomes a sensor, and the other becomes a receiver. When you hold the receiver coin up to your ear, you can hear anything you could hear if you were in the location of the sensor coin. There is no range limit on how far the coins can hear each other from, although they fail to function if they are ever on separate planes. The spell ends if you lose concentration or if you cast it again.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the spell no longer requires concentration.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"a matching pair of coins","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[{"level":5,"typeId":12,"dice":null,"value":0,"details":"No longer requires concentration"}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Communication","Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1285641,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":141828,"definitionKey":"1118725998:141828","name":"Lofiso's Esoteric Knowledge Search","level":2,"school":"Divination","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":"Square Feet","aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

Placing the focus on your forehead you speak aloud the word or subject you want searched and for the sake of the spell is known as the search term. You search the surrounding area for information, written or currently being spoken matching the search term. This spell searches the range for any information matching that search term, and in the case of more general subjects such as math use the searchers comprehension of what constitutes that subject to determine what is found. Upon finding more than one term a list of found results is projected into the user's mind allowing them to choose which result they wish to use. Upon choosing the result they will know the location of the information and any relevant information for finding the information such as page number or who was speaking it.

\r\n

 If a higher level spell slot is used the range increases by 10 feet per spell slot.

This spell is frequently used to assist magewrights in creating and maintaining their work. To cast this spell, the magewright speaks a brief incantation while touching a set of Artisan’s tools. For the duration of the spell the caster has advantage on all checks made with that set of Artisan’s tools. 

If this spell is used during each day of work on a downtime activity, the costs of materials consumed, and number of days required for the work are halved.

You put two fingers to your temple and your mind begins to work at lightning speed. While only a moment passes in real time, in your mind you have the equivalent of ten minutes to think over a problem at hand, dive into nearly-forgotten corners of your memory, and evaluate immediate threats around you, helping you determine the best course of action to take in the next few seconds. This grants you the following benefits until the start of your next turn:
\r\n
\r\n
    \r\n
  • You gain advantage on ability checks
    • \r\n
  • You add 1d4 to your AC and saving throws
    • \r\n
  • Potentially other insights, as determined by the DM
    • \r\n
\r\n
At higher levels. If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can affect a willing creature you touch in addition to yourself. During the spell you can telepathically communicate with the other creature if it has a language, and can exchange memories (if willing), allowing you to mentally collaborate with perfect clarity.\r\n

Magic)","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":7,"durationUnit":"Day","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":30},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You prevent further effects of disease, poison, and decay on anything living or dead for 1 week. This does not purify food, neutralize poison, or cure disease but halts spoilage of food, stops disease progression, and halts damage caused by poison until the end of the spell duration. This spell will also preserve a body for the Raise Dead spell, adding 1 week to the time that the creature can be dead before being raised. Multiple castings of this spell will extend this preservation by 1 week from the most recent casting. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

Touch any object that is small enough to hold in your hands. As you utter the words of the spell your eyes roll back into your head and you enter a trance for 1d4+4 minutes. For the duration, your third eye beholds a vision of all that has transpired around that object in the last 12 hours. The range of the vision is a sphere with a 5 ft radius centered on the object. Beyond the sphere is swirling white fog.

\r\n

When you cast this spell with a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, increase the duration of the trance by an additional 1d4 and the span of time recalled by 12 hours for each spell level above the 2nd.

2nd."}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Scrying","Detection","Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spellscale","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1965021,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":222132,"definitionKey":"1118725998:222132","name":"Reconstruct Contraption","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":10,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You can completely reconstruct any contraption that is less than 5ft x 5ft. You need a part of the original contraption you're working with, having less parts means taking longer time to reconstruct. You also use scrap metals worth at least 35gp, the more complicated the contraption, the more scrap metals you'll need. If the contraption has magic embed to it, do a DC 15 (spellcasting ability) with the proper modifier. In a success, proceed to make reconstruction. However, in a fail, it will require an extra time of at least 5 mins. The DM will decide how much time it takes, worth/amount of scrap metal, and the extra time given. 

\r\n

While reconstructing, you can make one new modification to the contraption on a successful DC 20 INT check, only have one chance. At a fail, proceed to reconstruct the contraption without any new modifications. You can ask the DM what modification you will make, and he/she can allow it or not.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2,3],"componentsDescription":"scraps of any type of metal worth at least 35gp, any part of the original contraption","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"characterlevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":10,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1243172,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":136894,"definitionKey":"1118725998:136894","name":"Repair","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

A still-functional object or construct you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This has no effect on living creatures, undead, or objects/constructs that have been damaged to the point they no longer function.

\r\n

For the spell to work, the caster must have observed the object or construct in its fully functional state. In the case of mundane objects, the caster can still perform the spell as long as they have observed an object that is similar or functions in the same manner. (ie, having observed a rapier, a rapier can be repaired, but not a longsword)

\r\n

A spell slot MUST be consumed to repair magical objects or constructs, UNLESS the caster is a Transmutation Wizard.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

Touch","level":1,"school":"Divination","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

While concentrating on this spell, you can touch one book or scroll and absorb the knowledge contained within as if you had just read it. This is equivalent to a solid reading but not deep study. You do not gain perfect recall of the information, only what you would have gleaned from reading it completely once. The spell ends after 1 minute, when you lose concentration, or after you've absorbed 1 book or scroll.

\r\n

If you cannot read the language of the source, the spell has no effect. This spell also has no effect on a magical source (such as a tome of understanding or a spell scroll).

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can touch and absorb one more book or scroll for each level above 2nd.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"a scrap of parchment and a pinch of tinder","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1.00","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spellscale","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":4321400,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":524723,"definitionKey":"1118725998:524723","name":"Separate","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":15,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":1},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

Choose a single substance with a volume of no more than 1 cubic foot and within 15 ft to separate into its chemical elements or individual parts of a mixture. It is up to the player what part they wish to separate, but the can only select one substance at a time. If the substance is being worn or carried, it cannot be targeted. If the substance is floating in the air make an attack roll, with the AC following the table below. Separating a substance into its chemical elements does not work on organic substances like blood. Additionally, the spell has no effect on magical items or constructs.

\r\n

When cast at a level higher than 2nd, the caster can choose to either increase the spell's range by 15 ft each level or increase the area of effect by 1 cubic ft each level. When cast at 7th level, the caster can choose to separate a chemical element from itself, isolating each atom individually. This releases some energy and will result in a very, VERY fine dust of whatever element was separated. When cast at 9th level, the caster can choose for a chemical element (specifically) to undergo nuclear fission due to the separation being so complete via magic. If there is enough fissile material present or a radioactive element or isotope be targeted, the result will be very explosive, hot, blinding, and radioactive.

\r\n

WARNING: THIS WILL LIKELY KILL THE CASTER AND ANYONE NEAR THEM!!!!! DO NOT MESS WITH NUCLEAR PHYSICS!!!!!! YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!!!!

\r\n

Table:

\r\n

Gas: AC 16, Powder: AC 14

\r\n

Note: Any volatility regarding the substance a caster chooses has the potential to harm the caster. Use with caution.

Through your understanding of bonds and connections, you touch one creature who is friendly to you. For the duration of the spell, so long as you and the individual stay within 200 feet of one another; you two can share the same bonus of one skill or tool proficiency. This sharing of skill bonus can go in either direction, whether it is you sharing a skill/tool with them or them sharing a skill/tool with you. For the purpose of either check, you share the same ability score modifier, proficiency bonus, and expertise as the friendly target. If the individual becomes hostile to you for any reason the spell is broken and the material components are consumed.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. If this spell is cast using a 3rd level spell slot or higher the user can designate another creature to also share the skill or toll proficiency bonus for every level above 2nd level. For material components, each creature must have their own silver band.

This spell allows you to read written material in a quarter of the time it would normally take to read it.

\r\n

Additionally, if using this spell while copying a spell into your spellbook or creating scrolls this spell reduces the time needed by half (this stacks with your school's savant bonus) but does not reduce the cost of materials needed; however, roll a percentile die on a 0-15 the copying is imperfect and the time and materials spent are wasted.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"A Small Hourglass","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1.0","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Control","Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":3},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":817509,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":88425,"definitionKey":"1118725998:88425","name":"Transmosis","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":24,"activationType":7},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

This spell has the ability to transfer the magic of one common magical item, to another nonmagical or magical item. If the magic of the item is compatible with the type of item being transferred to — a warhammer could not absorb the power of a vorpal sword for instance — then the caster can spend time engaged in a process to transfer the magic from one to the other. If an item requires attunement for it to be used, then the caster must be attuned to it during the casting of this spell. Any magic within the item receiving the transfer is destroyed and replaced by the new powers. The item being transferred from loses its magic at the completion of this spell.

\r\n

Casting this spell requires 24 hours of continual contact with each item involved in the process. Platinum, in any form, to a certain value dependant on the rarity of the item being drained, is required as a catalyst during the process and is consumed by the spell. At the end of the process, the caster suffers one level of exhaustion for each successive level of rarity of the item above mundane. Transferring the magic of a legendary item would therefore inflict five levels of exhaustion on the caster.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can transfer the magic from an uncommon magical item to your chosen item. With a 5th level slot, the item being transferred from can be rare, a 7th level slot allows you to transfer from a very rare item, and a 9th level slot is required to transfer the magic of a legendary item.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2,3],"componentsDescription":"platinum to a value based on rarity; 5gp common; 20gp uncommon; 200gp rare; 2,000gp very rare; 10,000gp legendary","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1.1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[{"level":null,"typeId":12,"dice":null,"value":2,"details":"(See Description)"}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":24,"activationType":7},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":3676612,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":441536,"definitionKey":"1118725998:441536","name":"Tyngdekraft’s Scripture Assimilation","level":2,"school":"Divination","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":10,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You choose one non magical book, scroll or writing of any type, that you must touch throughout the casting of the spell. The spell also translates any language the text is written in, unless the DM rules otherwise. The actual reading time of the affected item cannot be higher than 24 hours. When the spell is completed you learn the following information:

\r\n
    \r\n
  • Everything visible for you to read.
    • \r\n
  • Presence of any hidden notes, but not its content or location in the item.
    • \r\n
  • Type of paper and ink the text is written in.
    • \r\n
  • Name of the language its written in.
    • \r\n
  • Approximate age of the item.
    • \r\n
\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3nd level or higher, the maximum reading time of the targeted writing, increases by 48 hours for each slot level above 2nd.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"15 gp worth of incense, wich the spell consumes","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1.1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Detection","Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":10,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":4716323,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":575111,"definitionKey":"1118725998:575111","name":"Woodworking","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Special"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":10},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

This spell enables the caster to shape and mold any inanimate wood (as opposed to wood connected to a living plant) within range within a 10' cube as follows:

\r\n
    \r\n
  • Cure wood: Any wood is instantly cured and ready for use in building
    • \r\n
  • Impress mark: A mark, usually  a makers mark, of the caster's desire is formed in an area of the wood
    • \r\n
  • Only when cast as a ritual during which the wood is shaped. Only one function can be done per round and only the area within the 10' cube can be manipulated, but parts not manipulated may be outside the area.\r\n
      \r\n
    • Make boards: The area the caster focuses on is sliced by planes of force into boards of desired dimensions
      • \r\n
    • Join: sections of wood that are touching are fused together.
      • \r\n
    • Move: one or more pieces of wood within the area may be moved at a speed of up to 5'/r.
      • \r\n
    • Slice: a plane of force slices desired sections of wood separating them
      • \r\n
    • Shape: pieces of wood may be shaped according the caster's imagination and woodworking skill. 
      • \r\n
    \r\n
    • \r\n
","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Creation","Control","Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":10},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1338981,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":147832,"definitionKey":"1118725998:147832","name":"Xephy's Arcane Escalation","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":4},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

As a reaction, you may add your power to a spell being cast within 30-feet of you. You must make an Intelligence saving throw against the spell save DC of the caster of the targeted spell. On a success the target spell is cast at a higher level by one spell level. On a failure you immediately take Psychic damage equal to 2d6 plus your spellcasting ability modifier. If this spell is subjected to a Counterspell, you automatically fail the save and take damage.

\r\n

So Far Beneath Me. Spells that are lower than one spell slot level than this spell is cast at may be automatically elevated by one level without making the saving throw. Any higher than one level still requires the Intelligence saving throw versus the target spell's save DC. For example: casting this spell at a 5th level may automatically elevate a 2nd level spell being cast to 3rd level, but you are required to succeed on the save if you aim to elevate the target spell from 2nd level to 4th or even higher to 5th.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you may elevate the spell an additional spell level on a successful save per spell slot level used above 2nd. Damage incurred is also increased by 1d6 on a failed save per spell slot level used above 2nd. According to Cosmic Law, no spells cast may be raised higher than the 9th level.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":4,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1.2","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":true,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"Which you take while a creature casts a spell within range","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":4},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":4604525,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":560543,"definitionKey":"1118725998:560543","name":"Accelerate Ally","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

School: Chronomancy (Transmutation)
(Intended for use with the Chronomancer subclass)

\r\n

A single willing creature that you can see within range allows you to accelerate its relative passage of time.  The target's gains +2 to AC, has its movement speed doubled, gains advantage on all Dexterity saves, and may take one additional action each turn until the spell ends. This additional action must be used to Attack with a single weapon, Dash, Disengage, Hide, use an item, or interact with an object.  Upon termination, the flow of time snaps back like a stretched rubber band, resulting in the effected creature being unable to move or take any actions for 1 whole round.

\r\n

This spell is similar to a common 3rd level wizard spell, except that it differs in the exact implementation of the effect, and is available to practitioners of Chronomancy as a 2nd level spell, due to the caster's advanced grasp of time manipulation.

Forge","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":8,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You heat a patch of air to the great temperatures of a forge. You can hold up metal to that area and soften it just as a real forge would and then work the metal appropriately. Only items placed in the heated area by the caster are affected; the heat doesn’t affect anything else, and it can’t be felt by living creatures at all. This spell, along with a portable anvil, greatly lessens the difficulty for a craftsman repairing equipment in the field.
Enhancement: If air forge is cast using a spell slot higher than 2nd level, it heats a number of cubic feet of air equal to the spell slot used.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1411002,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":156053,"definitionKey":"1118725998:156053","name":"Alchemical Transmutation","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":10,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":5},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

As part of the casting of this spell, you draw a magical transmutation circle up to 5 feet in diameter on a flat surface.  Non-magical objects with a volume of up to  5 cubic feet, may be placed within the circle.  When you finish casting this spell, objects within the circle instantly and permanently take on a new shape of your choice.  The new objects are composed of the same material as the objects placed within the circle.  You can create as many new objects as you like, so long as their combined volume is not greater than the original volume of objects placed within the circle.  For example, you might transform a log into 10 javelins,  100 arrows,  1000 toothpicks, or another other wooden object or objects that do not exceed the volume of the original log, subject to DM discretion.  Your DM might require you to make an Intelligence check in order to create complex or intricate objects with this spell.

\r\n

An alternative use of this spell is to alter the very surface upon which the transmutation circle is drawn.  This usage of the spell must follow the same rules as above.  The surface must not be magical, and its new shape can not have more volume than a 5 foot cube.  Otherwise, the surface takes on any shape you desire.

\r\n

You may cast this spell to greater effect at higher levels.  For each level spell slot you use beyond first level, the maximum volume of objects you can transmute increases by 5 cubic feet.  For example, if you cast this spell using a second level spell slot, you could affect a volume of objects up to 10 cubic feet, 15 cubic feet for a third level slot, and so on.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2,3],"componentsDescription":"Chalk or charcoal with which to draw, and the materials to be transformed.","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Shapechanging"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":5},"activation":{"activationTime":10,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1028737,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":111371,"definitionKey":"1118725998:111371","name":"Allana's Library Rats","level":1,"school":"Divination","duration":{"durationInterval":10,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

Describe key words about a topic. This spell creates 1d4+1 rats made of force energy that run from your hand towards written materials, such as books or scrolls.

\r\n

When a rat of force hits a written material containing one or more key words, the rat is absorbed by the item, which starts glowing with yellow light. The item hit in such way will remain glowing for up ten minutes or until dispelled.

\r\n

The spell can locate a specific book or scroll or written material known to you, as long as you have clear recollection of its name or the author's or even its contents. And only if the said item is really present at the place, since the spell cannot create the item out of thin air, only locate it within range.

\r\n

Similar to Locate Objects spell, this spell can't locate an object if any thickness of lead, even a thin sheet, blocks a direct path between you and the object.

You permanently change one aspect of a willing target. You can grow facial hair, take it away, change hair or skin color, change height or weight and even the sex of the target, and many more options. You can't, however, change the race of the target, or the height/weight to a point where it would change their size. The target's sex can become sexless or intersex. 

\r\n

This spell cannot change any aspect that has already been changed by a Sorcerer's Wild Magic or a curse. It also can't be used to regrow lost limbs, eyes, etc.

You alter the flow of time around you, granting yourself and an ally a crucial moment to reposition yourselves. As part of the bonus action used to cast this spell, you can immediately take the Dash action. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks. If you move at least 10 feet, any ally within 5 feet of you when you end your movement can immediately use its reaction to move up to its speed.

You tap the ancient knowledge of fate and fortune, giving you a greater ability to focus on a particularly difficult academic problem. Whenever you make a knowledge roll  before the spell ends, you can roll a d6 and add the number rolled to knowledge skill. You can roll the die before or after making the ability check.

\r\n

e,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":38447,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":8895,"definitionKey":"1118725998:8895","name":"Aquatic Adaptation","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You adapt your body to an aquatic environment, sprouting gills and growing webbing between your fingers. You can breathe underwater and gain a swimming speed equal to your walking speed. 

","snippet":null,"concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Shapechanging"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":137701,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":25018,"definitionKey":"1118725998:25018","name":"Arcane Evasion","level":2,"school":"Abjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":4},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

When an attack you can see is made against you or an event such as a trap, hazard or spell occurs that would require you to make a Dexterity save you may use your Reaction to cast this spell. When you do time slows just for a few moments for you to select an occupied space you can see within 30 feet of you and when you do you are instantly teleported to that space. If that space is away from the triggering event or is not within the targeted space of the triggering attack you evade it and are completely unharmed.

\r\n

This spell requires you to have the ability to make a step - a small start of movement that forms the somatic component of the spell, so unless you have the means to eschew the somatic component (such as a Sorcerer's Suble Spell Metamagic) you must have have a speed greater than 0 and not be Restrained.

\r\n

Channeling the magics in this way and using such dimensional magics - manipulating space and the flow of time - in a single moment is very taxing on the body. After using this spell you suffer 1 level of Exhaustion. This spell cannot be cast if you have 2 or more levels of Exhaustion.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[{"type":1,"conditionId":4,"conditionDuration":0,"durationUnit":"Special","exception":"1 level."}],"tags":["Teleportation","Damage","Movement","Negation","Combat","Warding"],"castingTimeDescription":"in response to an attack or to an event requiring a Dexterity save.","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":4},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":4947551,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":605328,"definitionKey":"1118725998:605328","name":"Arguments Against Design","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

 

\r\n

The world is generally made of up solid things. These things are their own things, indivisible; there are few natural things that are made of different, readily separable elements. Some animals, despite being of and from nature themselves, construct unnatural creations, blighting nature. Birds do this when making their nests, beavers do this when building their dams, but no creature exhibits the complete hubris, the utter disregard for everything good and natural more readily than man. They not only build things out of different things and rearrange nature, they claim to improve upon it, changing the very nature of things. And in the grand irony, as man seeks to completely unravel nature and reality through magic, it has discovered a way to use this magic to return its aberrant creations back unto nature.

\r\n

The spell undoes the construction of a single object, breaking it down into its individual parts. Sewn or weaved clothing breaks down to its individual threads, mechanical objects separate into their respective parts, wooden constructions split into to their individual boards and nails, stonework breaks down to the singular slabs and bricks, glue unsticks, soldering weakens and dissolves, a book unbinds, etc. It simply disassembles as if all of its fastenings and bindings just came undone. The pieces are not harmed (barring a fall from a great height or some similar circumstance) and the item can theoretically be reassembled.

\r\n

The spell can affect an object of size tiny. If an object is larger than this, that much of it is still disassembled. If the spell is used against a construct (as in a monster) it deals 2d8 force damage. Magic items can't be disassembled or transmuted by this spell. 

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the size of the object you can deconstruct increases by one category, and the damage dealt increase by 1d8.

to Ink","level":2,"school":"Enchantment","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":10,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

While speaking encantations, you can enchant water and remains of charred wood to create an inklike liquid, fit to scribe spells into a spellbook.
Each ounce of ink created requires one cubic inch of charred wood. 

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"water and one cubic inch of charred wood per ounce of ink created","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Creation"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":10,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":12532,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":4146,"definitionKey":"1118725998:4146","name":"Assimilate Knowledge","level":2,"school":"Divination","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You place your hand on a book or some other collection of written text for 1 minute. During this time, you magically draw the essence of the text and copy it into your mind. Once the spell is complete, the book is unchanged but you mentally retain a visually identical copy of the images and text contained within the book, of up to 500 pages.

\n

Any text written in a language you know becomes immediately familiar to you as if you had read each page recently, but not thoroughly.

\n

Regardless of the language, you also understand which important topics are covered in the text as well as the names of important characters and locations. In addition, you understand the basic structure of the book, as if you had read a table of contents and index in a language you know.

\n

Any time after assimilating a text, you can identically write out the entire book or specific pages as they appeared in the original, even if it was written in a language you do not know. Doing so requires proper inks and parchment, as well as approximately 10 minutes per page and between 2 and 8 hours per image. Any magical properties of the original text cannot be replicated, such as text from a wizard's spellbook, a spell scroll, or a magical tome.

For the duration, you understand the non-literal meaning of any spoken or hidden language. The spell doesn't uncover lies, just the implied metaphorical underlying meaning.

\r\n

 

\r\n

Credit: Brennan Lee Mulligan - Dimension 20

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"A handful of sand","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Social"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":2453447,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":282283,"definitionKey":"1118725998:282283","name":"Bestow Minor Magicka","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Special"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You pluck a strand of hair from your body and wrap it around a willing creatures finger or wrist. Upon completing the spell you reach into their mind and plant the subconscious ability to cast one cantrip from your list of cantrips. The target gains the ability to cast that cantrip using constitution as their spellcasting modifier. This effect ends either once the cantrip is cast or you finish a long rest. 

\r\n

This spell can only be cast on one willing target at a time, and should it be cast a second time the original spell fades from the targets subconscious.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"A strand of the caster's hair","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":421483,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":40805,"definitionKey":"1118725998:40805","name":"Chronomantic Orb","level":1,"school":"Evocation","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Special"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":90,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

School: Chronomancy (Evocation)
(Intended for use with the Chronomancer subclass)

\r\n

The caster pulls from the demiplane of time a swirling orb, 4 inches in diameter, made of the mist-smoke of that plane, which is then hurled at a target. The rotation of the momentum of time causes havoc on impact with any object or linear creature.

\r\n

Damage: The caster makes an attack roll.  It that attack roll hits, the orb deals 2d8 damage as random parts of the target accelerate, pause, slow, or reverse in time, causing significant temporal stress.

\r\n

Damage may be increased by casting with higher level spell slots.

\r\n

Effect: In addition to this damage, the normal flow of time is disrupted for the target, causing their senses to perceive the world slightly out of phase for 1 round. During this time, they lose any positive Dex modifier, have Disadvantage on all attacks, and have a 50% chance of having any spells they cast fail.

\r\n

The temporal effect of the orb may be changed by casting at higher odd-level spell slots.

\r\n

The material component is a tanzanite shard that has spent one subjective day in the demiplane of time, which must simply be kept on the caster's person.

\r\n

At Higher Levels:
Damage: Every spell slot level above 1st adds an additional 1d8 to the damage.
Effect: A 1st level slot orb causes the victim to Wis save or be affected byTemporal Disjuction for 1 round (Victim loses any positive Dex modifier, has Disadvantage on all attacks, and has a 50% chance of having any spells they cast fail). A 3rd level slot orb causes the victim to Wis save or be Slowed for 1d4 rounds (As per standard spell). A 5th level slot orb causes the victim to Wis save or be affected by Time Loop for 1d4 + 1 rounds (Victim must repeat the action taken this round, or attempt to repeat it, no matter what). A 7th level slot orb causes the victim to Wis save or become Temporal Pushed (Victim is thrown forward in time 1 round plus up to 1 round per caster level - chosen by caster). A 9th level slot orb causes the victim to Wis save or become trapped in Temporal Stasis indefinitely (Victim is suspended in time and cannot move, act, age, nor die).

\r\n

This spell is an original work.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"A tanzanite shard that has spent one subjective day in the demiplane of time.","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":90,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1692729,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":191058,"definitionKey":"1118725998:191058","name":"Create Lesser Soul Gem","level":2,"school":"Necromancy","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Until Dispelled"},"activation":{"activationTime":10,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You extract the soul of a dying creature and trap it within a crystal, creating a soul gem.

\r\n

This creature must be the size category of tiny, small, or medium. The creature must have a CR under 1 or intelligence under 6. 

\r\n

The target makes a CON save against your spell save DC. If the target fails the save, the creature dies, and its soul is captured as a soul gem.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"a rare gem or crystal worth at least 50 gp","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Damage","Buff"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":10,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":4503372,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":547922,"definitionKey":"1118725998:547922","name":"Decipher","level":1,"school":"Divination","duration":{"durationInterval":10,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Social"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":421610,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":40826,"definitionKey":"1118725998:40826","name":"Decelerate Creatures","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":120,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":40},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

School: Chronomancy (Transmutation)
(Intended for use with the Chronomancer subclass)

\r\n

You slightly inhibit the flow of time around up to six target creatures in a 40-foot cube.  Each of these targets must succeed on a Wisdom save or be affected by the spell.

\r\n

Each affected target has their movement speed reduced by half, −2 to AC and to Dexterity saves, and cannot use any Reactions. During each victim's turn, they must choose between using an action or a bonus action, instead of using both. Affected victims can also only use a single melee or ranged attack each round, while the spells is in effect.

\r\n

Affected spellcasters who attempt to cast a spell with casting time of 1 action must roll a d20. If the result is an 11 or higher, the spell completion (and effect) is delayed until the caster's next turn, and ANOTHER action must be spent on that turn in order to complete the spell. If an action cannot be used in this way, or all actions are spent performing other actions on that following turn, then the spell is wasted.

\r\n

Affected victims are allowed an additional Wisdom save at the end of each turn. If successful, they break free of the effect, though the spell continues to effect all other victims.

\r\n

This spell is similar to a common 3rd level wizard spell, except that it differs in the exact implementation of the effect, and is available to the practitioners of Chronomancy as a 2nd level spell, due to the caster's advanced grasp of time manipulation.

You touch a corpse or other remains. The target instantly decay into nothingness, with only skeletal bones unaffected by the spell.

\r\n

The spell has no effect on a target that is magically animated, undead, or under the effects of a gentle repose spell.

You touch a corpse. The creature decomposes at a massively accelerated rate. The remains, including the bones, turn to soil and dust. The target can't be raised as a corporeal undead, such as a zombie or a ghoul, but its soul is still vulnerable to undeath and may inhabit or create a new body. This spell has no effect on constructs.

You touch a non-magical book, scroll, or parchment and engulf the object in flames. You gain an intuitive understanding of any written content that the object contained, but you must understand the language in which the content was written. You don't recall the content word for word, but you remember the concepts and facts found within, as though you had thoroughly read the content multiple times.

For the duration, you sense the presence of metal veins or objects that are larger than 4 inches within 30 feet of you. If you sense metal in this way, you can use your action to see a faint aura around any metal object, and you learn what metal it is and if the object is affected by any kind of magic.

\r\n

The casting of this ritual during the practice of alchemy will provide advantage on any check made for the use of Alchemical Supplies.  Sources of questionable reputation have reported that this spell may also be of use while making poisons and herbalist's concoctions.

\r\n

If cast using a 3rd level spell slot, the caster may target an individual engaged in the alchemical arts other than themselves.

\r\n

If cast using a 4th level spell slot, the caster may target any two individuals engaged in the alchemical arts.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,3],"componentsDescription":"At least one tool used in the art of alchemy (an alembic, beaker, or crucible, for example) and at least one raw alchemical ingredient. ","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":".01","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":3},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1116947,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":121664,"definitionKey":"1118725998:121664","name":"Electrify Water","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":120,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":20},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You pass electrical currents through a body of water or water-like liquid, potentially harming creatures that are within it. Choose a point in a body of liquid that you can see within range. Each creature touching the same body of liquid as the point must make a Constitution saving throw if they within 20-feet of the point. A creature that has a swimming speed makes this save with advantage. On a failed save, a creature takes 4d6 lightning damage and is paralyzed until the beginning of your next turn, or half as much damage and isn't paralyzed on a successful one.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 2nd.
