process"}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Creation","Damage"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spellscale","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":120,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":3,"activationType":7},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":5090069,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":623281,"definitionKey":"1118725998:623281","name":"Daardendrian's Diminutive Construct","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":7},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You convert raw materials into products of the same material. For example, you can fabricate a dagger from an ingot, a rope from a patch of hemp, and clothes from flax or wool.

\r\n

Choose raw materials that you can see within range. You can fabricate a Tiny or smaller object (contained within a 1.3-foot cube), given a sufficient quantity of raw material. 

\r\n

Creatures or magic items can't be created or transmuted by this spell. You must have proficiency with the type of artisan's tools used to craft such objects.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"Appropriate artisan tools.","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Creation"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":7},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1724541,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":195081,"definitionKey":"1118725998:195081","name":"Palimpsest's Construct Mending","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

A spell devised by a Warforged wizard that wished to relieve the burden of her constant repairs from her allies, this spell affects only Warforged and Constructs, using the principles of the Mending cantrip and the Fabricate spell along with her observations of the Cure Wounds spell and the Paladin's Lay on Hands ability to repair structural damage and replenish the energy of these beings and even restore functionality to lost or severely damaged limbs. The target construct recovers hit points equal to 2d12 + your Spellcasting modifier.

\r\n

While the spell can restore limbs to constructs, this is limited only to mundane materials such as wood, stone, and metals on the level of iron and bronze; exceptionally hard materials, or materials with magical properties such as Mithral and Adamantine resist the effects of the spell and cannot be used. Stone taken from sources such as a creature affected by Petrification crumbles to dust, as the spell recognizes the nature of it and triggers a failsafe.

\r\n


At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by 1d12 for each slot level above 2nd.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"Two Lodestones and Raw Materials such as wood, stone, and metal that the spell consumes, should it be Points","isGranted":false,"bonusTypes":[],"value":null,"availableToMulticlass":null,"modifierTypeId":0,"modifierSubTypeId":0,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"die":{"diceCount":2,"diceValue":12,"diceMultiplier":null,"fixedValue":null,"diceString":"2d12"},"count":1,"durationUnit":null,"usePrimaryStat":true,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[{"level":1,"typeId":15,"dice":{"diceCount":1,"diceValue":12,"diceMultiplier":null,"fixedValue":0,"diceString":"1d12"},"value":null,"details":""}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]}}],"conditions":[],"tags":["Healing"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spellscale","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1430041,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":158122,"definitionKey":"1118725998:158122","name":"Alter Self (Disguise Enchantment)","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Day","durationType":"Until Dispelled or Triggered"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":3},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You assume a different form.

\r\n

Change Appearance. You transform your appearance. You decide what you look like, including your height, weight, facial features, sound of your voice, hair length, coloration, and distinguishing characteristics, if any. You can make yourself appear as a member of another race, though none of your statistics change. You also can't appear as a creature of a different size than you; if you're bipedal, you can't use this spell to become quadrupedal, for instance. At any time for the duration of the spell, you can use your action to change your appearance in this way again.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Shapechanging"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":3},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":2227554,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":253343,"definitionKey":"1118725998:253343","name":"Alter Self (Psionic)","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You use the power of your mind to assume a different form in the eyes of all who observe you. When you manifest this power you decide what you look like, including your height, weight, facial features, sound of your voice, hair length, coloration, and distinguishing characteristics, if any. You can make yourself appear as a member of another race, though none of your statistics change. You also can't appear as a creature of a different size than you, and your basic shape stays the same; if you're bipedal, you can't use this spell to become quadrupedal, for instance. At any time for the duration of the spell, you can use your action to change your appearance in this way again.

\r\n

Unlike the arcane spell of the same name, nothing about you is physically changed, therefore you cannot, for example, grow gills and adapt to an aquatic environment. You can appear as an aquatic creature, but you cannot gain any physical skills from that illusion. Likewise, this power does not allow the benefit of natural weapons. 

Augment: 

The duration is increased by one hour per level manifested. 

\r\n

 

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Shapechanging"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":2973296,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":348926,"definitionKey":"1118725998:348926","name":"Aruel's Improved Wild Shape","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":20,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

A spell created by a wizard that envy the druid's wild shape skill.

\r\n
    \r\n
  • when cast you assume the form of a beast or monstrosity that you had a part of. Your game Statistics are replaced by the Statistics of the beast, but you retain your Alignment, personality, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores. You also retain all of your skill and saving throw Proficiencies, in addition to gaining those of the creature. If the creature has the same proficiency as you and the bonus in its stat block is higher than yours, use the creature's bonus instead of yours.
    • \r\n
  • When you transform, you assume the creature's Hit Points and Hit Dice. When you revert to your normal form, you return to the number of Hit Points you had before you transformed. However, if you revert as a result of Dropping to 0 Hit Points, any excess damage carries over to your normal form. For example, if you take 10 damage in animal form and have only 1 hit point left, you revert and take 9 damage. As long as the excess damage doesn't reduce your normal form to 0 Hit Points, you aren't knocked Unconscious.
    • \r\n
  • You can't cast Spells, and your ability to speak or take any action that requires hands is limited to the capabilities of your wild form. 
    • \r\n
\r\n

the max Cr creature you can assume is equal to the spell slot level you use.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"A part of the beast or monstrosity you choose to transform.","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Shapechanging"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":4255037,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":516368,"definitionKey":"1118725998:516368","name":"Lesser Shapechange","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":30,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You assume the form of a different creature for the duration. The new form can be of any creature with a challenge rating equal to your level or lower. The creature can't be a construct or an undead, and you must have seen the sort of creature at least once. You transform into an average example of that creature, one without any class levels or the Spellcasting trait.

\r\n

Your game statistics are replaced by the statistics of the chosen creature, though you retain your alignment and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores. You also retain all of your skill and saving throw proficiencies, in addition to gaining those of the creature. If the creature has the same proficiency as you and the bonus listed in its statistics is higher than yours, use the creature's bonus in place of yours. You can't use any legendary actions or lair actions of the new form.

\r\n

You don't retain the benefit of any features from your class, race, or other source and can use them. You can only speak if the creature can normally speak.

\r\n

When you transform, you choose whether your equipment falls to the ground, merges into the new form, or is worn by it. Worn equipment functions as normal. During this spell's duration, you can use your action to assume a different form following the same restrictions and rules for the original form, with one exception: if your new form has more hit points than your current one, your hit points remain at their current value.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"All","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Shapechanging"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":5730081,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":706260,"definitionKey":"1118725998:706260","name":"Xin's Arcane Smelter","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

Created by the famed artificer and spellwright Xin al-Qasim, this spell was designed to smelt raw ore or refined metal into ingots suitable for sale or blacksmithing.

\r\n

When cast this spell will melt, refine, shape and cool to room temperature any piece of metallic ore. Once shaped the ingots can be utilized as any other. If examined the ingots will be found to be of the best quality of refinement and quality.

\r\n

 

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"a piece of ingot and a flame","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Creation","Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":922612,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":99116,"definitionKey":"1118725998:99116","name":"Beguile","level":2,"school":"Illusion","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You attempt to mask your physical presence from a creature within range that you can see, which must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is considered blinded, deafened, and unable to smell when it attempts to detect you. This spell ends early if you attack the affected creature or force it to make a saving throw.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2,3],"componentsDescription":"a bit of cotton and wool","saveDcAbilityId":5,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1.0","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":true,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[{"level":1,"typeId":11,"dice":null,"value":1,"details":""}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[{"type":1,"conditionId":1,"conditionDuration":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","exception":"Towards caster only."},{"type":1,"conditionId":3,"conditionDuration":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","exception":"Towards caster only."}],"tags":["Debuff","Detection","Deception"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":990977,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":107476,"definitionKey":"1118725998:107476","name":"Arcane Seeing","level":1,"school":"Divination","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You gain the ability to easily read a person's intentions and body language. Choose a creature you can see and that can hear. You gain advantage on all Investigation, Insight and Perception checks made against the target creature, as well they have disadvantage on all Deception and Sleight of Hand checks against you while you maintain concentration. As well as the normal rules for concentration, the spell ends if the target would succeed in a Deception/Sleight of Hand check against your Spell Save DC, or your Investigation/Insight/Perception check, whichever is higher.

\r\n

At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you gain a +1 to all relevant checks, and the target gains a -1 to all relevant checks for each slot level above 1st.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Detection"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":5670080,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":698786,"definitionKey":"1118725998:698786","name":"Arcane Analysis","level":2,"school":"Divination","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":10,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You begin magically analyzing an object of small size or smaller. This gives you all physical information about this, but will not reveal any magical information, such as a magic items properties. When you are done, the DM might give you an appropriate Investigation check, based on how complex the analyzed object is. If you succeed you understand how to use it and gains all relevant information about the objects physical form. 

\r\n

If you succeed the Investigation check by 10 or more, you learn how to recreate the object. If it is a magic item, you will learn to recreate it without its magical properties. 

\r\n

All information you obtain with this spell, will automatically be written down in a book or scroll of your choice.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a 3rd-level spell slot, the maximum size of the object increases to Medium. When you cast this spell using a 4th-level spell slot the maximum size increases to large. When you cast this spell using a 5th-level spell slot, the maximum size increases to Huge and when you cast this spell using a 6th-level spell slot, the maximum size increases to Gargantuan.

You imbue your speech with enchantment magic to receive discounts on items. One humanoid of your choice  makes a charisma saving throw. On a failed save, an item that the target is willingly selling is now being sold for 20-50%(dm's choice) less. On a successful save, the spell ends with no effect.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2,3],"componentsDescription":"fine gold dust worth 50 gp","saveDcAbilityId":6,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":true,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Utility","Deception","Charmed"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Sight","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":2191241,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":248468,"definitionKey":"1118725998:248468","name":"Obfuscate","level":1,"school":"Illusion","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You target any number of willing creatures within range that you can see, obfuscating your conversation from others. You and any target that remain within range of you, will be able to understand each other, but to anyone else your conversation will sounds like meaningless noise, which is almost completely unnoticeable in a noisy area. A creature actively trying to eavesdrop or scry must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw in order to hear through the illusion.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration is concentration, up to 10 minutes. If you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration is 1 hour. If you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the duration is 8 hours. If you use a 9th level spell slot, the duration is 24 hours. Using a spell slot of 5th level or higher grants a duration that doesn't require concentration.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"a piece of paper containing a ciphered message","saveDcAbilityId":5,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":true,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Communication","Buff","Social","Scrying","Utility","Deception","Warding"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":3301442,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":391539,"definitionKey":"1118725998:391539","name":"Camouflage Shift","level":1,"school":"Illusion","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":3},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

When you cast this spell, color shifts around to create illusions that camouflage you. While under the spell's effect, Wisdom (Perception) checks made to see you have disadvantage, and you have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide. The spell ends early for you if cast another spell.

ll,"limitedUse":null,"id":4948397,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":605420,"definitionKey":"1118725998:605420","name":"Galdern's Seismography","level":1,"school":"Divination","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

A wave of deep vibration tremors through all earth, metal or rock within range. Your magic ripples through the ground, informing you of any tunnels, cavities or buried objects. You learn the size and location of any such cavities, as well as the general composition of the surrounding earth. You do not learn about the contents of such cavities, nor any properties of buried objects, other than they are not composed of earth, metal or rock.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the spells range doubles for each slot level above the 1st.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2,3],"componentsDescription":"a heavy percussion instrument, or a very large hammer","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"2","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Detection","Environment","Exploration"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":2960533,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":347238,"definitionKey":"1118725998:347238","name":"Vulberg's Fleet Feet","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":8,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You choose up to three willing creatures you can touch, coating their shins with clay, causing them to cover great distances while traveling. For the duration of the spell any humanoid you chose gains the ability to sprint while traveling for an hour, covering twice the usual distance for a fast pace. Any mount you chose gains the ability to gallop for 8 hours instead of the normal one for the duration of the spell. If any creature under the effect of this spell makes an attack roll or saving throw, or travels over rough terrain, the spell no longer affects them.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target up to two additional willing creatures that you can reach for each slot level above 3rd.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"A bit of clay based paint worth at least 5 gold, which the spell consumes","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[{"level":3,"typeId":1,"dice":null,"value":2,"details":""}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Movement","Exploration"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":216324,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":35830,"definitionKey":"1118725998:35830","name":"Augment Familiar","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":10,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You touch your familiar and empower it, making it quicker and stronger.

\r\n

Your familiar's speed, hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 5 for the duration. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and gains resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. 

\r\n

The spell has no effect on other creatures.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"SC 1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Buff"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":15449,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":2784,"definitionKey":"1118725998:2784","name":"Improved Find Familiar","level":1,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":7},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You gain the service of a familiar, a spirit that takes an animal form you choose: bat, cat, crab, frog (toad), hawk, lizard, octopus, owl, poisonous snake, fish (quipper), rat, raven, sea horse, spider, or weasel. Appearing in an unoccupied space within range, the familiar has the statistics of the chosen form, though it is a celestial, fey, or fiend (your choice) instead of a beast.

\r\n

CR 1/8 or less @ 5th, CR 1/4 or less @10th, CR 1/2 or less @ 15th, CR 1 or less @ 20th.

\r\n

Your familiar acts independently of you, but it always obeys your commands. In combat, it rolls its own initiative and acts on its own turn. A familiar can't attack, but it can take other actions as normal. Starting at 10th level it can make 1 attack using your bonus action, At 15th level it becomes a free action. At 20th level it can make 2 attacks as a free action.

\r\n

When the familiar drops to 0 hit points, it disappears, leaving behind no physical form. It reappears after you cast this spell again. At 5th level it has 1/2 the creatures normal hit points. At 10th level it has full hit points of the creature. At 15th level 1/4 of you hit points or its normal hit points which every is higher. At 20th level it has 1/4 plus 1 hit point for every character level. 

\r\n

While your familiar is within 100, 125 (5th), 150 (10th), 175 (15th), 200 (20th) feet of you, you can communicate with it telepathically. Additionally, as an action, you can see through your familiar's eyes and hear what it hears until the start of your next turn, gaining the benefits of any special senses that the familiar has. During this time, you are deaf and blind with regard to your own senses.

\r\n

As an action, you can temporarily dismiss your familiar. It disappears into a pocket dimension where it awaits your summons. Alternatively, you can dismiss it forever. As an action while it is temporarily dismissed, you can cause it to reappear in any unoccupied space within 30 feet of you.

\r\n

You can't have more than one familiar at a time. If you cast this spell while you already have a familiar, you instead cause it to adopt a new form. Choose one of the forms from the above list. Your familiar transforms into the chosen creature.

\r\n

Finally, when you cast a spell with a range of touch, your familiar can deliver the spell as if it had cast the spell. Your familiar must be within 100 125 (5th), 150 (10th), 175 (15th), 200 (20th) feet of you, and it must use its reaction to deliver the spell when you cast it. If the spell requires an attack roll, you use your attack modifier for the roll.

","snippet":null,"concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"(10 (1st), 50 (5th), 100 (10th), 150 (15th) or 200 (20th) gp worth of charcoal, incense, and herbs that must be consumed by fire in a brass brazier) ","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"A","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Summoning"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"characterlevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":7},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":4971423,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":607721,"definitionKey":"1118725998:607721","name":"Enhance Familiar","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":7},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You bestow upon your familiar heightened Intelligence and special powers. This is not a true spell–and thus cannot be dispelled–instead this is a series of special processes you develop for one of your familiars. Special familiars (imps, quasits, etc.) cannot be enhanced in this way.

\r\n

Each enhancement requires research that takes an amount of time and money, as shown in the Enhancement Costs table.This research requires access to a well-stocked library as well as proficiency in the Arcana skill. Each enhancement (1–8) must be completed in order and cannot be redone.

\r\n

As the enhancement of a familiar continues, the familiar should develop a personality that seems almost human, displaying specific traits, likes, dislikes, opinions, habits, and foibles. Its animal qualities also develop as its personality matures. A black cat might develop discriminating and expensive tastes in food and creature comforts; a crow might become a collector of gaudy gemstones and jewelry; and an otter might develop a frolicsome personality combining a short attention span for serious matters with a love for playful pranks.

\r\n

The familiar takes on some of your alignment and attitudes, though a leaning toward a neutral alignment, a holdover from its simple animal origin, will always remain. The familiar may tend to become more of an independent NPC as it is enhanced. The DM should carefully consider if relaxing the dependency of the familiar on the wizard will improve the campaign play.

\r\n
Enhancement Costs
\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n
Enhancement
Minimum Character LevelTimeCost
131 day100 gp
25half workweek350 gp
371 workweek2,500 gp
492 workweeks5,000 gp
5114 workweeks7,500 gp
6138 workweeks10,000 gp
71512 workweeks15,000 gp
81716 workweeks20,000 gp
\r\n
Enhancement 1
\r\n

The familiar's intellect improves, its Intelligence becomes 4 + 1d3. It can now think in your native tongue and communicate with simple sentences through your empathic link. The familiar gains one special power from Enhancement Table 1. Unless otherwise noted (or obvious), the familiar's spell abilities affect only the familiar. The familiar's spellcasting ability is Intelligence.

\r\n
Enhancement 2
\r\n

The familiar's Intelligence rises to 7 + 1d3. The familiar can, with patient tutoring by you, learn to communicate in other languages, up to a number of languages equal to its Intelligence modifier (minimum of one language). The acquisition of certain special powers may enable a familiar to learn languages from someone other than you. The familiar gains another special power, as determined by a dice roll. Note that stronger powers will replace weaker powers of the same general type.

\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n
1d10Special Power
1–8One from Enhancement Table 1
9–0One from Enhancement Table 2
\r\n
Enhancement 3
\r\n

The familiar's Intelligence improves one more time, becoming 10 + 1d2. It can now think in your native tongue and communicate with simple sentences through your empathic link. The familiar can now be tutored to read languages as well as communicate with them through the empathic link to you. The familiar acquires another special power as decided by a dice roll.

\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n
1d10Special Power
1–6One from Enhancement Table 1
7–0One from Enhancement Table 2
\r\n
Enhancement 4
\r\n

The familiar's Intelligence will not improve further. The familiar can now be tutored to read languages as well as communicate with them through the empathic link to you. The familiar acquires another special power as decided by a dice roll.

\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n
1d10Special Power
1–3One from Enhancement Table 1
4–8One from Enhancement Table 2
9–0One from Enhancement Table 3
\r\n
Enhancement 5
\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n
1d10Special Power
1–2Two from Enhancement Table 1
3–4Two from Enhancement Table 2
5–8One from Enhancement Table 3
9–0One from Enhancement Table 4
\r\n
Enhancement 6
\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n
1d10Special Power
1–2Two from Enhancement Table 2
3–5One from Enhancement Table 3
5–8One from Enhancement Table 4
9–0One from Enhancement Table 5
\r\n
Enhancement 7
\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n

1–3One from Enhancement Table 3
4–7One from Enhancement Table 4
8–0One from Enhancement Table 5

Enhancement 8
\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n
