\r\n
Enhancement Table 1
\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n
1d100Special Power
01–05Dancing lights, twice per day.
06–20Detect magic, twice per day. The familiar cannot learn the school of magic.
21–25Feather fall, twice per day.
26–30Jump (only 1 jump), three times per day.
31–40Pass without trace, once per day. Only the familiar gains the benefits of the spell.
41–60Protection from evil and good, once per day.
61–75Speak with animals, twice per day. Restricted to own general family; for example, a cat could talk to any feline.
76–80Spider climb, once per day.
81–95Unseen servant, once per day.
96–00Familiar can detect substance, three times per day. For 10 minutes, the familiar can detect one type of metal, mineral, vegetable or other substance within 30 feet. The DM determines the type of substance. At DM's option, familiar may display an obsessive interest in the substance, and may seek and collect it at inopportune times.
\r\n
Enhancement Table 2
\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n
1d100Special Power
01–10Blur, twice per day.
11–20Disguise self, once per day. Must still be own essential animal form, but can change color/pattern, subtle body features (black cat to siamese or manx), and size (±25%)
21–25Comprehend languages, once per day. Reading a written message requires Intelligence of 10.
26–35Detect evil and good, once per day.
36–45See invisibility, once per day, duration reduced to 10 minutes.
46–50Grease, once per day.
51–60Fog cloud, once per day.
61–75Shield, once per day.
76–80Speak with animals, twice per day. Restricted to own biological class; for example, a cat could talk to any mammal.
81–85Familiar can sense true north, three times per day. Roll a d20, on a 3–20, the familiar accurately senses true north. If wrong, the DM determines which direction the familiar calls north–for instance by rolling a d6, 1,2 east; 3,4 south; 5,6 west.
86–00Familiar can meld into its environment, once per day. The familiar moves into an object it can touch made of natural materials–like stone or wood–melding itself and all it's equipment into the object. Detecting the familiar's presence requires a successful Intelligence (Investigation) check against it's spell save DC.
\r\n
Enhancement Table 3
\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n
1d100Special Power
01–10Alter self, once per day, can only use the change appearance option, must transform into the form of another animal familiar.
11–20Animal friendship, once per day. Must be of the same family (cat/feline).
21–25Fly, once per day. Familiars already able to fly instead gain +50% speed.
26–40Invisibility, once per day; or knock, once per day (50% chance of either).
41–50Mirror image, once per day.
51–65Water breathing, once per day.
66–70Speak with animals, three times per day.
71–80Familiar can sense hostiles, three times per day. For the next minute, it knows the direction of the nearest creature hostile to it within 30 feet, but not the creature's distance from it. The familiar can sense the presence of hostile creatures that are ethereal, invisible, disguised, or hidden, as well as those in plain sight.
81–85Familiar can detect secrets, twice per day. The familiar knows the direction of the nearest trap or secret door within 30 feet.
86–95Intelligence raised to 12 + 1d2. If already as high or higher, reroll.
96–00Familiar gains a normal voice and can speak any language it knows.
\r\n
Enhancement Table 4
\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n
1d100Special Power
01–10Blink, once per day.
11–20Animal friendship, once per day. Must be of the same biological class (cat/mammal).
21–25Nondetection, once per day.
26–35Hold animal, once per day. Same as hold person, but targets only beasts of Medium size or smaller. Can only target beast of same family.
36–45Familiar can shrink nonmagical objects, once per week. Touched object shrinks to 1/16 of normal dimensions and ca. 1/4,000 original volume and mass. Optionally, object becomes a cloth patch like those of a robe of useful items. Only affects objects <10 cubic ft. that aren’t being worn or carried. Object returns to normal if any creature other than the familiar touches it, or if the familiar decides it does.
46–55Knock, once per day.
56–65Conjure animals, once per week. Summons 8 beasts of the same species as the familiar.
66–70Tongues, once per day. If familiar does not have speech, reroll.
71–80Gaseous form, once per day.
81–85Glibness, once per week. Duration reduced to 10 minutes. If familiar does not have speech, reroll.
86–95Intelligence raised to 14 + 1d2. If already as high or higher, reroll.
96–00Polymorph, once per day. Like the spell except the familiar assumes a specific humanoid form. The DM decides exact details of appearance. Intelligence is retained, enhanced animal senses are lost in its humanoid form.
\r\n
Enhancement Table 5
\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n
1d100Special Power
01–10Animal friendship, once per day.
11–20Dimension door, once per week. Up to 200 lbs. in the familiar's grasp or jaws can be taken.
21–35Hold animal, once per day. Same as hold person, but targets only beasts of Medium size or smaller. Can only target beast of same biological class.
36–45Greater invisibility, once per day.
46–55Stoneskin, once per week.
56–70Conjure animals, once per week. Limited to beasts of challenge rating 1/4 or lower, that are within the same biological family (cat/panther).
71–75Telekinesis, once per day. Can only manipulate objects.
76–80Familiar becomes very persuasive, once per day. For 10 minutes the familiar gains a +5 bonus to Charisma (Persuasion) checks–and for the duration–it can cast suggestion once.
81–90Intelligence raised to 16 + 1d2. Also gains proficiency with Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.
91–00Polymorph, once per week. Familiar assumes a specific beast of the same family (e.g. cat to leopard). Duration reduced to 30 minutes.
","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"charcoal, incense, and herbs that must be consumed by fire in a brass brazier","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"0.4","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Buff"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":7},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":4351647,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":528653,"definitionKey":"1118725998:528653","name":"Monstrous Summoning","level":1,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Until Dispelled"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You summon a monster in a space near you. It can be any from the monster manual, but its CR must be equal to or less than half your character level plus your spellcasting ability modifier. The monster is under your control and obeys your commands. The monster remains until it is killed, or until you dismiss it. 

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,3],"componentsDescription":"A fossilized fang, a clump of fur.","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Summoning"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"characterlevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":4440337,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":539377,"definitionKey":"1118725998:539377","name":"Create Air Envelope","level":1,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":3,"durationUnit":"Day","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

This spell creates an envelope of air, surrounding the caster, that lasts for 10 minutes in a planetary body with or without air. Within the phlogiston or on a spelljammer ship, the air lasts for 3 days. This spells isolates a volume of air from its surroundings. The \"barrier\" it forms offers only the slightest resistance to any person or thing that travels through it. All the barrier does is keep the air inside of it from mixing with the air outside.

\r\n

For instance, a volume of air would be unaffected even if the Stinking Cloud was cast near it. It would also keep the noxious gas inside if it the spell was cast there. If cast while underwater, the envelope of air would rise to the surface, leaving any creatures who were inside of it where they are.

\r\n

Also, it allows spells and other effects requiring air to function. However, if a burning fire is within the envelope, any remaining time is reduced by half.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, increase its duration within the phlogiston or on a spelljammer ship by one month (30 days) for each slot level above 1st.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[{"level":1,"typeId":3,"dice":null,"value":1,"details":""}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spellscale","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":2971104,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":348583,"definitionKey":"1118725998:348583","name":"Create Greater Spell Scroll","level":2,"school":"Enchantment","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":24,"activationType":7},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

By means of this spell, you create a greater spell scroll. Choose from the options below. For a level spell, you must expend a spell slot of the appropriate level in addition to the other costs. You suffer exhaustion as normal from lack of sleep while casting this spell.

\r\n

Cantrip: You inscribe a cantrip you know into a greater spell scroll. The cost of the gem that must be provided is 10gp.

\r\n

1st level: You inscribe a 1st level spell you know and have prepared into a greater spell scroll. The cost of the gem that must be provided is 15gp.

\r\n

2nd level: You inscribe a 2nd level spell you know and have prepared into a greater spell scroll. The cost of the gem that must be provided is 200gp.

\r\n

3rd level: You inscribe a 3rd level spell you know and have prepared into a greater spell scroll. The cost of the gem that must be provided is 400gp.

\r\n

4th level: You inscribe a 4th level spell you know and have prepared into a greater spell scroll. The cost of the gem that must be provided is 2,250gp.

\r\n

5th level: You inscribe a 5th level spell you know and have prepared into a greater  spell scroll. The cost of the gem that must be provided is 4,500gp.

\r\n

6th level: You inscribe a 6th level spell you know and have prepared into a greater spell scroll. The cost of the gem that must be provided is 12,500gp. The casting time required to create this spell is increased to 2 days.

\r\n

7th level: You inscribe a 7th level spell you know and have prepared into a greater  spell scroll. The cost of the gem that must be provided is 22,500gp. The casting time required to create this spell is increased to 3 days.

\r\n

8th level: You inscribe a 8th level spell you know and have prepared into a greater spell scroll. The cost of the gem that must be provided is 45,000gp. The casting time required to create this spell is increased to 4 days.

\r\n

9th level: You inscribe a 9th level spell you know and have prepared into a greater spell scroll. The cost of the gem that must be provided is 250,000gp. The casting time required to create this spell is increased to 6 days.

\r\n

Quickened Spell: You inscribe a spell of a level of your choice, as above, but add a quickening enchantment. If the spell has a casting time of 1 minute or longer, its casting time is halved. If it has a casting time of 1 action, you can make it take a casting time of 1 bonus action instead. The cost of the gem that must be provided is doubled.

\r\n

Universal Spell: You inscribe a spell of a level of your choice, as above, but add simplifying magics. There is no Intelligence score requirement for the using of the spell scroll. The cost of the gem that must be provided is doubled.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"a gem, the gold cost of which determines the level of spell scroll that can be made, which is consumed.","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Creation","Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":24,"activationType":7},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":5321082,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":653939,"definitionKey":"1118725998:653939","name":"Create Material","level":1,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

A caster makes several hand motions around either a glass vial or small, wooden chest, focusing on the creation of nonmagic material worth 25 GP or less, and speaking the name of the desired material. If successful, the material is created inside either the vial or wooden chest, which must be shut in order to summon the material from a supernatural plane of existence. In order to determine whether the spell is successful, roll a d100.

\r\n

On a roll of 1-25, the spell fails to create the desired material, creating either a vial of random fluid or a wooden chest full of random solid material. 

\r\n

On a roll of 25-50, the spell creates 10 GP worth of the desired material.

\r\n

On a roll of 51-75, the spell creates 25 GP worth of the desired material.

\r\n

On a roll of 76-100, the spell creates 50 GP worth of the desired material.

\r\n

 

\r\n

The material lasts for 1 minute, after which the material turns into simple brine or ordinary sand. 

\r\n

If the spell is cast using higher-level spell slots, the value of the component material increases by 25 GP per additional spell slot. 

\r\n

 

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"A glass vial to create a liquid component, which is filled with the liquid material, or a small wooden chest the size of a jewelry box to create solid materials.","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":5766052,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":710190,"definitionKey":"1118725998:710190","name":"Summon Ancestral Protector","level":1,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":7},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You bring into existence a being from another time and space. You summon a creature, which possesses extraplanar properties, and as a result is susceptible to banishment and any spells or abilities which affect extraplanar enemies.

\r\n

You gain the service of a familiar, a spirit that takes a form you choose that fits your origin. Appearing in an unoccupied space within range, the familiar has the statistics of the chosen form, though it is a aberration, celestial, fey, fiend or monstrosity (your choice) instead of a beast. The size of the form it can take and challenge rating increases with your character's level, consult the chart below and with your DM since some creature's might be too powerful or too big as a familiar.

\r\n

The time to cast the spell is increased by one hour per size increase of the creature.

\r\n

You may also mount your familiar if it has no fly speed, is at least one size larger than you, and has an appropriate anatomy that can serve as a mount. If you do so, you control the familiar in combat. While mounted on it, you can make any spell you cast that targets only you also target your familiar.

\r\n

Your familiar acts independently of you, but it always obeys your commands. In combat, it rolls its own initiative and acts on its own turn. A familiar can't attack, but it can take other actions as normal. Starting at 10th level it can make 1 attack using your bonus action, at 15th level it becomes a free action. At 20th level it can make 2 attacks as a free action.

\r\n

When the familiar drops to 0 hit points, it disappears, leaving behind no physical form. At 5th level it has 1/2 the creatures normal hit points. At 10th level it has full hit points of the creature. At 15th level 1/4 of you hit points or its normal hit points which every is higher. At 20th level it has 1/4 plus 1 hit point for every character level.  It reappears after you cast this spell again. If it does so while you are mounted on it, you can use your reaction to dismount it as it disappears and land on your feet. Otherwise, you are dismounted and fall prone in a space within 5 feet of it.

\r\n

While your familiar is within 100 feet at 1st level, 125 at 5th, 150 at 10th, 175 at 15th and 200 at 20th. of you, you can communicate with it telepathically. Additionally, as an action, you can see through your familiar's eyes and hear what it hears until the start of your next turn, gaining the benefits of any special senses that the familiar has. During this time, you are deaf and blind with regard to your own senses. At 10th level, you can choose to use one sense of the familiar and keep the other, for example, you choose to see through the familiar and can still hear in your form but not through the familiar.

\r\n

As an action, you can temporarily dismiss your familiar. It disappears into a pocket dimension where it awaits your summons. If you do so while you are mounted on it, you can use your reaction to dismount it as it disappears and land on your feet. Otherwise, you are dismounted and fall prone in a space within 5 feet of it. It disappears into a pocket dimension where it awaits your summons. Alternatively, you can dismiss it forever. Alternatively, you can dismiss it forever. As an action while it is temporarily dismissed, you can cause it to reappear in any unoccupied space within 30 feet of you. If your familiar loses hit points and is transported into the pocket dimension, the familiar regains 5 hit points for every hour it remains. Additionally any status effects or conditions that the familiar suffers from are cured if the familiar remains in the pocket dimension for the length of a long rest. Curses however remain, and cannot be cured in this way.

\r\n

You can't have more than one familiar at a time. If you cast this spell while you already have a familiar, you instead cause it to adopt a new form. Choose one of the forms from the list below. Your familiar transforms into the chosen creature. You may do so while mounted, as long as the new form also has no fly speed, is at least one size larger than you, and has an appropriate anatomy that can serve as a mount; otherwise, you are dismounted and fall prone in a space within 5 feet of it.

\r\n

Finally, when you cast a spell with a range of touch, your familiar can deliver the spell as if it had cast the spell. Your familiar must be within 100 feet of you,  at 1st level, 125 ft at 5th, 150 ft at 10th, 175 ft at 15th and 200 ft at 20th. and it must use its reaction to deliver the spell when you cast it. If the spell requires an attack roll, you use your attack modifier for the roll.

\r\n

 

\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n
Character LevelSizeMax CRCreature Examples
1stTiny1/8Cat, Chwinga, Homunculus, Killmoulis, Tressym, Neogi Hatchling, Valenar Hawk.
2nd 1/2Abyssal Chicken, Pixie,Sprite, Velociraptor, Magma Mephit, Anvilwrought Raptor, Gazer Familiar
3rdSmall1Chitine, Imp, Quasit, Quickling,Choker, Screaming Devilkin, Core Spawn Crawler
    
5thMedium3Madcap, Meenlock, Neogi, Spined Devil, Basilisk, Bearded Devil, Berbalang, Bulezau, Demos Magen, Dolgaunt, Forlarren
    
7thMedium5Babau, Blistercoil Weird, Demogorgon (Monstrosity), Oread, Helmed Horror, Neogi Master, Barbed Devil, Cambion, Flesh Golem, Mezzoloth, Skum, Xorn
    
10thMedium7Gauth, Galeb Duhr, Medusa, White Abishai, Air Elemental Myrmidon, Dhergoloth, Earth Elemental, Korred, Maurezhi, Mind Flayer, Tsucora Quori, The Lost
    
15thLarge9Black Abishai, Blue Slaad, Draegloth, White Abishai, Air Elemental Myrmidon, Dhergoloth, Fluxcharger, Oni, Canoloth, Chain Devil, Cloaker, Abhorrent Overlord
    
20thHuge12Death Slaad, Gearkeeper Construct, Balhannoth, Behir, Chardalyn Dragon, Horned Devil, Nightmare Shepherd, Dao, Gray Render, Oinoloth, Arclight Phoenix, Aeorian Nullifier
","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"10 gp worth of charcoal, incense, and herbs that must be consumed by fire in a brass brazier","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Summoning"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"characterlevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":7},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":5700499,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":702876,"definitionKey":"1118725998:702876","name":"Find Soulmate","level":1,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":8},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You reach into the sea of your soul and conjure a familiar onto the material plane. Your familiar can be a wide range of things, and possesses a challenge rating equal to their level, which is always the same as your own. Their statistics increase as they grow alongside you in whatever form that takes, up to the mutual discretion of your GM and yourself (slimes may grow larger, beasts may mature, etc.). 

\r\n

You may spend time and roll animal handling in safe zones to teach them skills or strategies (at the GM's discretion) to practice for use in combat.

\r\n

This familiar is permanent and will obey your orders without question, even to the death. If they are killed, you may re-summon them during a long rest, though they may take time to fully restore themselves to their former glory.

\r\n

Once cast, you may not use this ability again to create any more companions until level 11, in which you may either enhance your pre-existing companion or create one additional companion, again, up to your GM's discretion.

\r\n

 

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"10 gp worth of charcoal, incense, and herbs that must be consumed by fire in a brass brazier","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Summoning"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":8},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":5992292,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":720406,"definitionKey":"1118725998:720406","name":"Warwick's Wandering Workshop","level":2,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":2,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":10},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

 

\r\n
\r\n

The Artificer placed a small, dense, palm-sized clockwork sphere of black metal embedded with cogs and gears and if one studied it closely one could see a tiny hourglass where the sand seemingly fell slower than it should, on the ground with his tinker's tools. He mutteredf an incantation and focused on the items for a moment and one could see the cogs and gears starts to twirl counter-clockwise faster and faster, even the hourglass seemed to spin until it emitted a blinding flash.

\r\n

The sound of creaking metal could be heard for a split second, as if the metal was folding itself out, with a whoosh. I blinked and saw now that instead of the sphere, a fully equipped ten by ten ft workshop had taken it's place and I swear I could could see a forcefield shimmer for a moment before it disappeared. When the artificer started to get to work inside the cube it strangely looked like he was twice as fast that he used to be.  
                                                                                                                                                                                - Unknown farmer, drunkenly, rambling at a tavern

\r\n
\r\n

 The sphere can be placed on any flat space. In order to properly activate, the sphere needs at least 5 ft of unhindered terrain on each side, or a 10 ft square area. A 10 ft immobile cube of temporal energy springs into existence arond you and the sphere folds out into a workshop and remains stationary for the duration. The spell fails if its area includes a larger creature or more than one creature.  If you or any creature attempts to move, cast a spell or attack through the cubes boundary, the forcefield and workshop vanishes immediately and the spell ends.

\r\n

Upon casting, you can choose or focus on an artisan's tool through your tinker's tools that you are proficient with to be available within the workshop, anyone may use chosen tool for the duration of the spell but only one creature can occupy the workshop at a time. The workshop changes its appearance and the materials within the workshop to suit the needs of the chosen tool. (Ex. if the chosen tool is Smith's Tools, then the workshop may contain a forge, anvil and various equipment.) The workshop has enough materials to maintain gear, and to make simple creations or non-magical items. If someone wished to use the work area for something other than simple creations or gear maintenance, then they must provide the required materials. You may touch another creature proficient with a crafting or artisan's skill, even if you don't have it, channel the proper workshop around the target for its needs.

Creatures within the workstation and proficient in the appropriate artisan's tools have advantage on their crafting skill checks. All tools counts as magical and unbreakable. Equipment and other materials created by this spell dissipate into smoke if moved outside the forcefield.

\r\n

Creatures and objects inside the workshop experience time differently to the outside world.  Upon completing the spell, you choose to either speed up or slow down time inside the workshop by a factor of two. 

\r\n

For example, if time inside the workshop is sped up, a task that would take four hours of normal time to complete can be completed in only two hours of normal time.  If time is slowed down, a spell that usually takes ten minutes of normal time to cast, would instead take twenty minutes of normal time. While a creature works at this bench, they do not need to eat, drink, or sleep, and do not suffer the effects of exhaustion due to lack of sleep. However, they won't gain any of the benefits of a long rest or short rest.

\r\n

Once the spell ends, every tool and material created by the spell fades from existence unless the caster use up the last minutes to cast it again prolonging it for another 2 hours. The spell also ends if its caster moves more than 30 ft from around the workshop.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can choose between increasing its radius 5 ft, allowing entrance for another creature, so that they can assist or work on their own project, or increasing the factor, for which it can speed up time, by 1 for each level above 2nd. Additionally the number of chosen tools, with which the workshop can merge and evolve, increases by 1 for each level above 2nd.

Additionally the number of chosen tools, with which the workshop can merge and evolve, increases by 1 for each level above 2nd."},{"level":1,"typeId":3,"dice":null,"value":1,"details":"When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can choose between increasing its radius 5 ft, allowing entrance for another creature, so that they can assist or work on their own project, or increasing the factor, for which it can speed up time, by 1 for each level above 2nd. Additionally the number of chosen tools, with which the workshop can merge and evolve, increases by 1 for each level above 2nd."}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Creation","Utility","Dunamancy"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spellscale","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":10},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":5859724,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":720406,"definitionKey":"1118725998:720406","name":"Warwick's Wandering Workshop","level":2,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":2,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":10},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

 

\r\n
\r\n

The Artificer placed a small, dense, palm-sized clockwork sphere of black metal embedded with cogs and gears and if one studied it closely one could see a tiny hourglass where the sand seemingly fell slower than it should, on the ground with his tinker's tools. He mutteredf an incantation and focused on the items for a moment and one could see the cogs and gears starts to twirl counter-clockwise faster and faster, even the hourglass seemed to spin until it emitted a blinding flash.

\r\n

The sound of creaking metal could be heard for a split second, as if the metal was folding itself out, with a whoosh. I blinked and saw now that instead of the sphere, a fully equipped ten by ten ft workshop had taken it's place and I swear I could could see a forcefield shimmer for a moment before it disappeared. When the artificer started to get to work inside the cube it strangely looked like he was twice as fast that he used to be.  
                                                                                                                                                                                - Unknown farmer, drunkenly, rambling at a tavern

\r\n
\r\n

 The sphere can be placed on any flat space. In order to properly activate, the sphere needs at least 5 ft of unhindered terrain on each side, or a 10 ft square area. A 10 ft immobile cube of temporal energy springs into existence arond you and the sphere folds out into a workshop and remains stationary for the duration. The spell fails if its area includes a larger creature or more than one creature.  If you or any creature attempts to move, cast a spell or attack through the cubes boundary, the forcefield and workshop vanishes immediately and the spell ends.

\r\n

Upon casting, you can choose or focus on an artisan's tool through your tinker's tools that you are proficient with to be available within the workshop, anyone may use chosen tool for the duration of the spell but only one creature can occupy the workshop at a time. The workshop changes its appearance and the materials within the workshop to suit the needs of the chosen tool. (Ex. if the chosen tool is Smith's Tools, then the workshop may contain a forge, anvil and various equipment.) The workshop has enough materials to maintain gear, and to make simple creations or non-magical items. If someone wished to use the work area for something other than simple creations or gear maintenance, then they must provide the required materials. You may touch another creature proficient with a crafting or artisan's skill, even if you don't have it, channel the proper workshop around the target for its needs.

Creatures within the workstation and proficient in the appropriate artisan's tools have advantage on their crafting skill checks. All tools counts as magical and unbreakable. Equipment and other materials created by this spell dissipate into smoke if moved outside the forcefield.

\r\n

Creatures and objects inside the workshop experience time differently to the outside world.  Upon completing the spell, you choose to either speed up or slow down time inside the workshop by a factor of two. 

\r\n

For example, if time inside the workshop is sped up, a task that would take four hours of normal time to complete can be completed in only two hours of normal time.  If time is slowed down, a spell that usually takes ten minutes of normal time to cast, would instead take twenty minutes of normal time. While a creature works at this bench, they do not need to eat, drink, or sleep, and do not suffer the effects of exhaustion due to lack of sleep. However, they won't gain any of the benefits of a long rest or short rest.

\r\n

Once the spell ends, every tool and material created by the spell fades from existence unless the caster use up the last minutes to cast it again prolonging it for another 2 hours. The spell also ends if its caster moves more than 30 ft from around the workshop.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can choose between increasing its radius 5 ft, allowing entrance for another creature, so that they can assist or work on their own project, or increasing the factor, for which it can speed up time, by 1 for each level above 2nd. Additionally the number of chosen tools, with which the workshop can merge and evolve, increases by 1 for each level above 2nd.

When you perceive a spell being cast, as a reaction, you can cast this spell to alter one aspect of the spell. If the spell is higher than first level, make an Intelligence Check DC 10 + spell level of the altered spell.

\r\n
    \r\n
  • Target: When you alter a spell that has a single target, you can change the target to your self or the caster. To change it to the caster, make a Intelligence Check against the caster's Wisdom Saving Throw. If the caster succeeds, the target is changed to your self.
    • \r\n
  • Increase: You can increase the number of die rolled for the spell by 1. (Example: If you alter a 3rd level fireball spell with Increase, it does 9d6 fire damage instead of 8d6 fire damage.)
    • \r\n
  • Decrease: You can decrease the number of die rolled for the spell by 1. (Example: If you alter a 3rd level fireball spell with Increase, it does 7d6 fire damage instead of 8d6 fire damage.)
    • \r\n
\r\n

At Higher Levels: You do not need to make the Intelligence Check for Spells that are equal or lower level than the spell slot used to cast this spell. In addition, the number of die Increase or Decrease is increased by 1 for each spell level higher than 1st(Example: if Alter Spell is cast at 2nd Level, Decrease decreases the number of die rolled by 2)

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1.0","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"When a Spell is Cast.","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":120,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":4},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":281140,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":41546,"definitionKey":"1118725998:41546","name":"Burrow Trick","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You touch the ground and an underground area becomes accessible through an invisible entrance at the point you touched. 

\r\n

The underground space can be reached by crawling through the invisible entrance. The space can hold as many as eight Medium or smaller creatures. The entrance will be visible only from inside the space. 

\r\n

Attacks and spells can't cross through the entrance into or out of the underground space, but those inside can see out of it as if through a 3-foot-by-5- foot window centered on the entrance.

\r\n

Anything inside the underground space is expelled when the spell ends.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"loose dirt and a chipmunk's claw","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[{"level":3,"typeId":3,"dice":null,"value":8,"details":"When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases to up to 8 hours. "}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":11674,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":3973,"definitionKey":"1118725998:3973","name":"Alchemical Transmutation","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You magically transform a potion you touch into a magic potion of the same rarity level.

\n

When the spell is cast, you must pass an Intelligence check to determine if the transformation was successful. The DC for the check is determined by the rarity of the potion you are attempting to transmute. Characters proficient with Alchemists' tools may add their proficiency bonus. On a failure, the potion loses its effect and becomes an inert vile of foul-tasting water. Attempting to make a \"blend\" is possible, but the check is made with disadvantage. The player still rolls on the potion miscibility table (DMG p. 140) as normal.

\n

Common- DC 10
Uncommon- DC 15
Rare- DC 20
Very Rare- DC 25
Legendary- DC 30

","snippet":null,"concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1.0","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":48346,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":9558,"definitionKey":"1118725998:9558","name":"Infuse Magic","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

Starting at 4th level, you gain the ability to channel your artificer spells into objects for later use. You learn the Infuse Magic spell. 

\r\n

Infuse Magic

\r\n

1st-level transmutation. Casting Time: 1 action. Range: Self. Components: V, S, M (50 gp worth of powders, inks, and gemstones per level of the infused spell, in addition to that spell's components) Duration: Instantaneous

\r\n

Select another artificer spell, you can increase its casting time by 10 minutes per level of the spell to infuse it into an item. Hold a nonmagical item throughout the casting. You expend a spell slot as if you had cast the spell, but none of the spell's effects occur. Instead, the spell transfers into that item for use as long as the item doesn't already contain a spell from this feature. While a spell is infused in this manner, you may not cast it using your spell slots until the infused item is destroyed or defused. 

\r\n

Any creature holding the item thereafter can use an action to activate the spell if the creature has an intelligence score of at least 6. The spell is cast using your spellcasting ability, targeting the creature that activates the item. If the spell targets more than one creature, the creature that activates the item selects the additional targets. If the spell has an area of effect, it is centered on the item. If the spell's range is self, it targets the creature that activates the item. Once the item is used to activate the infused spell, it must be recharged by an artificer with the Infuse Magic feature during a short or long rest before it may be used again. 

\r\n

You can have a limited number of infused spells at the same time. The number equals your intelligence modifier. By casting this spell again (using the infused item in lieu of other material components) on one of your infused items, you may destroy that item to regain the infused spell. Should an artificer infuse a new item that pushes them beyond their limit, another one of their infused items is destroyed, wherever it is.

","snippet":null,"concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"A gemstone worth at least 100gp","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":2487116,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":286596,"definitionKey":"1118725998:286596","name":"Arcane Stitches","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You touch a creature's wound causing it to stitch itself close and causing their natural healing to become amplified. The amplified healing regains a number of hit points equal to 1d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,3],"componentsDescription":"Alchohol and a piece of gold through Shadow","level":2,"school":"Abjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You become as shadow and are able to move through darkness and shadows at great speed. When casting this spell, choose a location within 60 feet that you can see that is located in darkness or shadow. Your body disappates into shadow and dashes towards the chosen location, where it reappears. While moving as a shadow, you have no physical form and are able to squeeze through small openings.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"2.0","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1181032,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":129583,"definitionKey":"1118725998:129583","name":"Blossom's Book Binder","level":1,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":7},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

This spell binds a book to a person and a place. The book is marked with a rune of binding (a faintly visible version of the caster's sigil) and will always return to its person first, its place second.

\r\n

If the person that is the subject of the binding be dead of imprisoned on another plane, the book returns to its place. If the place this book is bound to is damaged, moved, or destroyed, the book will return as close as possible to its place. 

\r\n

If the book is destroyed by fire, water, frost, or any other means, it will return after a year and a day. 

\r\n

The specific way in which the book is returned to its owner or place is not specified. It could be returned by teleportation, messenger, owl, or by any other appropriate means. The universe conspires to put this book with its person and/or in its place.

\r\n

No more than one publication, book, tome, title, treatise, opus, or manual may be bound to a person in this way. Each additional time this spell is cast by the caster, the current binding is broken and replaced by the new biding. Books unbound in this manner are \"lost\" if they were in the process of returning.

\r\n

This spell has no effect on sentient books or books that qualify as wondrous items.

\r\n

Some bards claim that this spell is the first spell, the very oldest spell in all of creation, and that it was wrought for the first magical apprentice.

\r\n
You turn an existing spell registered in your spellbook into a new shape which you decide upon casting the spell, you can transform the spell into one of the following formats:
\r\n
 
\r\n
    \r\n
  • A playing card
    • \r\n
  • A thin sheet of metal
    • \r\n
  • An engraved rock
    • \r\n
  • A strip of fabric
    • \r\n
  • A sheet of paper
    • \r\n
\r\n
\r\n

 

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"A spell written in a spellbook which the spell consumes","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":2612753,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":302894,"definitionKey":"1118725998:302894","name":"Angelfall’s Arcane Evasion","level":2,"school":"Abjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":4},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

When an attack you can see is made against you or an event such as a trap, hazard or spell that would require you to make a Dexterity save you may use your Reaction to cast this spell. When you do time slows just for a few moments for you to select an occupied space you can see within 30 feet of you and when you do you are instantly teleported to that space. If that space is away from the triggering event or is not within the targeted space of the triggering attack you evade it and are completely unharmed. If it is still within the effect, you can make your Dexterity Save with advantage, taking no damage on a successful save.

\r\n

Tiny creatures, including familiars, are teleported with you if they are touching you and not hostile toward you. 

\r\n

This spell requires you to have the ability to make a single step - a small start of a movement that forms the somatic component of the spell, so unless you have the means to eschew the somatic component (such as a Sorcerer's Subtle Spell Metamagic) you must have a speed greater than 0. 

\r\n

Channeling the magics in this way and using such dimensional magics - manipulating space and the flow of time - in a single moment is very taxing on the mind and body. Roll a DC14 Constitution saving throw. On a fail, you are [Condition]Stunned[/Condition] for 1 round as you are winded, and briefly overcome with exhaustion, similar to when the [Spell]Haste[/Spell] spell ends.  On a success, you are not [Condition]Stunned[/Condition] but your speed is halved and melee attacks are made at disadvantage for 1 round. Ranged attacks are unaffected. This spell cannot be cast if you have 2 or more levels of [Condition]Exhaustion[/Condition]

\r\n

At Higher Levels: When cast at 4th level or higher, the constitution saving throw is negated (as are the negative effects of both success and failure), and you can choose 1 willing target within 30 feet of you to take with you for every spell slot used above 3rd. All creatures are teleported to the same point with 5 feet of each other.

"},{"level":5,"typeId":1,"dice":null,"value":2,"details":"1 additional creature for every slot above 3rd, and no Constitution saving throw is required."}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Healing","Buff"],"castingTimeDescription":"in response to a spell or other hazard you can see requiring a Dex saving throw","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":4},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":4608448,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":561040,"definitionKey":"1118725998:561040","name":"Unseen Crafter","level":1,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Until Dispelled"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

This lesser variant of Unseen Servant spell is a boon to artificers and wizards who spend their time creating magic items.  This spell functions as Unseen Servant except that it will only work on crafting items or magic items associated with the artisan’s tools or kit used for the material component of the spell.  The Unseen Crafter will never move more than 25 feet away from the item it is crafting.

\r\n

 

\r\n

The Unseen Crafter is consider proficient in the use of the artisan’s tools or kit and can produce an item on its own provided it has sufficient materials and an appropriate work space.  The Unseen Crafter’s work can also be combined with the spellcaster’s proficiency to reduce crafting time and grant Advantage on any associated skill checks.

\r\n

 

\r\n

The Unseen Crafter will harmlessly dissipate when the item it is crafting is completed, the Unseen Crafter is more than 25 feet from the item it is crafting, or the spellcaster casts the spell again.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"A set of artisan's tools or a kit","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"20200703","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":2072141,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":234362,"definitionKey":"1118725998:234362","name":"Extradimensional Expansion","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":24,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You cause the interior dimensions of an object such as a bag or a chest to expand into an extradimensional space with a volume equal to four times the object’s original interior space. This extradimensional space is not bound to the shape of the original space, and can accommodate any item that can fit through the opening as long as the total volume of that item does not exceed the total available space. The extradimensional space can hold up to 5 pounds for each cubic foot. The object’s weight does not change, regardless of its contents.

\r\n

Placing an item in the space follows the normal rules for interacting with objects. Retrieving an item from the space requires you use an action. When you reach into the space for a specific item, the item is always magically on top.

\r\n

The space has a few limitations. If it is overloaded, or if a sharp object pierces it or tears it, the spell ends. When the spell ends, the interior dimensions revert to their original form. Should the volume of the contents exceed the volume of the space’s normal dimensions at this time, items inside the space are jettisoned at random into the Astral Plane until the volume of the contents in the space no longer exceeds its regular dimensions. If a breathing creature is placed within the space, the creature can survive for up to 10 minutes, after which time it begins to suffocate.

\r\n

Placing an item affected by this spell inside an extradimensional space created by a bag of holding, portable hole, or similar item instantly destroys both items and opens a gate to the Astral Plane. The gate originates where one item was placed inside the other. Any creature within 10 feet of the gate is sucked through it and deposited in a random location on the Astral Plane. The gate then closes. The gate is one-way only and it can’t be reopened.

\r\n

Casting this spell on a bag fashioned from the silk of a phase spider every day for one month permanently transforms the object into a bag of holding. At the DM’s discretion, this process might involve additional steps that may not be commonly known and which may be the substance of a quest. Additionally, the DM can allow other similar objects can be created using similar methods.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the interior dimensions of the object are expanded to eight times the original size and the space can hold 10 pounds for each cubic foot. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the interior dimensions of the object are expanded to twelve times the original size and the space can hold 15 pounds for each cubic foot. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the interior dimensions of the object are expanded to sixteen times the original size and the space can hold 20 pounds for each cubic foot. When you cast this spell using a 9th-level spell slot, the interior dimensions of the object are expanded to twenty times the original size and the space can hold 25 pounds for each cubic foot.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[3],"componentsDescription":"A Medium or smaller bag, chest, or similar object worth at least 100 gp","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[{"level":3,"typeId":9,"dice":null,"value":0,"details":"When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the interior dimensions of the object are expanded to eight times the original size and the space can hold 10 pounds for each cubic foot. "},{"level":5,"typeId":9,"dice":null,"value":0,"details":"When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the interior dimensions of the object are expanded to twelve times the original size and the space can hold 15 pounds for each cubic foot."},{"level":7,"typeId":9,"dice":null,"value":0,"details":"When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the interior dimensions of the object are expanded to sixteen times the original size and the space can hold 20 pounds for each cubic foot. "},{"level":9,"typeId":9,"dice":null,"value":0,"details":"When you cast this spell using a 9th-level spell slot, the interior dimensions of the object are expanded to twenty times the original size and the space can hold 25 pounds for each cubic foot. "}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1866834,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":210376,"definitionKey":"1118725998:210376","name":"Malthael's Magic Item Creation","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Special"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":8},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":5,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

To create a magic item, you must first meet several requirements before the actual creation. First, you must be at or above the required spellcaster level (not combined level for multi-classing). Second, you must have the required amount of gold pieces that will be consumed upon the spells completion. Third, you must have the amount of ingredients required that will be consumed upon the spells completion. If the spell is interrupted (e.g. counterspell or dispel magic), then the spell ends and no gold or ingredients are consumed, yet your spell slot is used. Additionally, you need to possess and be proficient with the tool kit related to the item if the item is not already made (e.g. Need to have and be proficient with a leather works kit and possess leather to craft sufficient leather armor for magical creation). Upon creation of the magic item, the caster can choose whether or not to attune to the item if it requires it.

\r\n

During the process of magical creation, the caster must make a constitution saving throw for every 8 hours or suffer 1 point of exhaustion. The DC = 8 + The spell level + # of exhaustion points. Allies can assist by feeding or casting magic to help make sure the caster doesn't suffer additional points of exhaustion due to lack of nourishment.

\r\n

Any complications in the creation process is up to the DM's discretion. (e.g. curses, person's of interest, enemies, wilderness)

\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n
Rarity LevelSpellcaster LevelGold requiredIngredients RequiredCasting Time
Common1st (1st level)50gp41 minute
Uncommon5th (3rd level)500gp81 hour
Rare9th (5th level)5,000gp128 hours
Very Rare13th (7th level)50,000gp1624 hours
Legendary17th (9th level)50,000+ gp20+3 days
\r\n

 

\r\n

The power and amount of properties you can have on your magic item relate to the rarity of the item (e.g. Common = 1, Legendary = 5). Consult with your DM on properties for your magic item.

\r\n

 Properties include but are not limited to: Effects, conditions, spellcasting, extra damage, attunement, abilities.

 You transmute up to 100 gp worth of coins into a precious gem of the same value, called a spellforged gem. If you cast this spell multiple times, you may create a gem with a total value of all coins used as material components for consecutive castings of this spell.

\r\n

Gems created by this spell are distinguishable from naturally occuring gems by a trained eye with a DC 12 Intelligence (Investigation) check. As an action, any arcane spellcaster can discern the exact value of a spellforged gem by touching it.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the maximum amount of coins you can transmute increases by 100 gp for each slot level above 1st.

You choose a 15-foot cube of empty space you can see within range. This area magically becomes an artisan's workshop of your choosing, complete with all of the tools necessary for basic crafting and repairs, though it does not contain any materials. None of the items created by this spell can be removed from the workshop. Additionally, any creature may enter the workshop and make use of it.

\r\n

The workshop disappears after 24 hours, leaving behind any items that were brought into it after its creation. Any items crafted using the workshop remain, and any changes or repairs made to items using the workshop's tools are permanent.

\r\n

The spell can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.
