You alter the appearance of a corpse in one of several ways:

\r\n
    \r\n
  • Edit Appearance: You mold the appearance of the corpse to look like another creature; you may only copy specific faces if you have a solid understanding of their appearance.

    • \r\n
  • Restore Form: You restore the corpse and bring it back into a more pristine condition - removing any wounds or damages done to it by nature and time.

    • \r\n
  • Doctor Evidence:  You doctor the evidence leading toward this creature's death.

    • \r\n
  • Clean Corpse: You make the corpse presentable.

    • \r\n
  • Remove Flesh: You turn the corpse into a skeleton.

    • \r\n
  • Add Flesh: You turn a skeleton into a full corpse.
    • \r\n
\r\n

At higher levels. When you cast this spell at a higher level, you may use this spell on a number of corpses equal to the level that the spell was cast at.

\r\n","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"the corpse itself","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1.1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":2336429,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":266934,"definitionKey":"1118725998:266934","name":"Capture Essence","level":1,"school":"Necromancy","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":5,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":5,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You can capture the essence of a creature inside a gemstone for use in crafting magic items.

\r\n

The spell requires the target to be deceased, and you must have a gemstone that is grand enough to hold the creature’s essence. The spell takes 5 minutes, must be performed within 5 feet of the creature, and only within 10 minutes of the creature’s death.

\r\n

Powerful creatures have volatile essences. To complete the spell, roll a d20 adding your Spellcasting Ability Modifier. If this beats the CR of the creature, the spell is a success; otherwise the essence is lost. If the gemstone is grand enough to hold the essence, it does not get destroyed. However if the spell is attempted with a gemstone that cannot hold the essence, or on a critical failure, it shatters and both the gemstone and the essence are lost.

\r\n

Once the spell is complete, you have a gemstone enchanted with the creature’s essence. Successfully crafting a magic item that contains this gemstone will imbue the item with abilities that correspond to the creature’s strengths, and on occasion, their weaknesses.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"a gemstone of greater worth than one tenth of the creature’s XP value. You give the subject the ability to glide through earth and stone as easily as an earth elemental does.
The affected creature can glide through stone, dirt, or almost any other sort of earth except metal as easily as a fish swims through water.
Its burrowing leaves behind no tunnel or hole, nor does it create any ripple or other signs of its presence.
A move earth spell cast on an area containing the affected creature flings the creature back 30 feet and stuns the creature for 1 round unless it succeeds on a DC 15 Fortitude save.

This spell repairs major structural damage to objects and heals constructs. It is a favored way to restore ships that have been severely damaged in battle, especially when they can’t be taken to a drydock. The object or construct that you touch regains the lesser of 20 hit points or half of its total hit points.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by 10 for each slot level above 2nd.

You magically assemble one nonmagical, nonliving inanimate construct or object that is no larger than 1 cubic foot when constructed. The target must have all required components within range of this spell when it is cast (including nails, bolts washers, screws etc), otherwise the spell fails.

\r\n

At Higher Levels: The area this spell can effect increases by 1 cubic foot for each slot level above 1st.

You create a squadron of tiny unseen servants that create a campsite for you and your companions. They will clear the land of debris, set up tents and bedrolls, start a fire, fetch water, and even begin cooking (although they are not particularly good cooks.)

\r\n

They cannot create the materials needed for the campsite; they can only use what is available to them in the immediate area and what you and your companions have brought. These servants have no other abilities.

A way to quickly and silently communicate complex ideas. This spell allows you to communicate complex thoughts (such as maps, diagrams, explanatory images-- which may move in a sequence to show a procedure-- and the like) silently to a willing participant upon touch. Uses for this spell include showing the target a creature's likeness to aid in recognition or a clear route to an unfamiliar place. If the recipient is not willing, this spell automatically fails. 

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":2811358,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":328591,"definitionKey":"1118725998:328591","name":"Deeppockets - Artificer","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":8,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You Touch a piece of pocketed cloth or leather non-magical apparel/ equipment for the duration of the spell items placed within the pocket/ pockets are considered weighing one tenth of their weight for purposes of carrying capacity. The pockets combined can carry up to 200lbs. When the spell ends the pocket reverts spilling any excess items there in to the floor.

\r\n

This spell is a favorite among Gnomish Workmen who fashion their rugged appeal with hundreds of tiny pockets and even traps to store things of an even greater unexpected nature and among elderly wizards who no longer posses the stamina of youth not to mention thieves for the purposes of smuggling short swords in scabbards thought to hold only knives or daggers or hide the loot of ill gotten gains.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"A Gold Needle & A Piece of Fine Cloth","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":3239467,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":383659,"definitionKey":"1118725998:383659","name":"Hamund's Harvesting Hands","level":1,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Until Dispelled"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

Target a dead creature within range that has a CR of 3 or less.This spell conjures an invisible pair of hands that harvest that creature for any useful materials as listed in their harvesting table. No ability check is required to harvest these materials, the hands automatically succeed in harvesting them, and then place them next to the creature's carcass. You still need to provide any requisite containers such as vials or bags, but the hands harvest all materials in half the time it would normally take. You may direct the hands to harvest certain materials first. Once all of a creatures useful materials have been harvested, the hands disappear.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the CR of the creature harvestable increases by 3 for each spell slot level above 1st

\r\n

 

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2,3],"componentsDescription":"A sharp knife and a pair of gloves","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[{"level":2,"typeId":12,"dice":null,"value":0,"details":"Hamund's Harvesting Hands - Scaling Level Value - 1, Scale Effect - Special, Fixed Value - 1, Details - CR increases by 3"}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":874987,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":94164,"definitionKey":"1118725998:94164","name":"Merge with Shadows","level":2,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":10,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

Your body becomes ethereal and you can literally lurk within the shadows. As an action and while in an area of darkness, you can meld into a pool of shadows within 5 feet of you that is at least 10 feet long and an equal distance wide for the duration of the spell. You speed is reduced to 0, you are immune to poison damage and the poisoned condition, you have resistance to all Nonmagical damage, except radiant damage. Any attempts to cause you to become grappled or restrained automatically fail. You are undetectable, unless a light source causes the shadows you are in to disappear, which then you are shunted into the nearest unoccupied space and the effect is lost. The spell ends early if you take any action or if you take radiant damage.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"a shard of hematite worth at least 10gp","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Environment"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":528144,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":55126,"definitionKey":"1118725998:55126","name":"Navigation","level":2,"school":"Divination","duration":{"durationInterval":24,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":10,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

For the next twenty four hours you know the precise direction to one place you have visited before. The place must be within 100 miles at the time of casting and on the same plane that the caster is on. The spell doesn't tell you the route to take. If the caster changes the place, falls unconscious, sleeps, or dispels it the spell ends.

\r\n

If casted at a higher level it extends the distance by 100 miles per spell slot above 2nd level.

\r\n

Few spells origins can be traced to a creator, and even fewer to a group of people whose ideals are understood. Even fewer are modern creations, this spell however, created by a one Doctor-Professor Howard of the Surgeons Guild, is designed to help the modern physician in their daily duties. Only tought to those proven to the Guild, this spell is proof of the Doctors entrance and membership.

\r\n
\r\n

Your hand is covered in a hovering spectral glove, and is able to go through skin and other deep tissue. As apart of the spell you can fix wounds or cause injuries, though the latter is thought of as malpractice, and will cause a member to be cast out of the Guild. 

\r\n
    \r\n
  • Body Fixing - Choose one willing creature that you can touch. You fix a broken rib or other bone, or stitch a wound. The chosen creature regains 1d4 + your spellcasting modifier. 
    • \r\n
  • Organ Twisting - Choose one willing creature that you can touch. You break a bone, or tear a muscle, or squeeze an artery. On a successful hit the target takes 2d6 nectoric damage. 
    • \r\n
\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a 2nd level spell slot, or higher, you add 1d4 (to Body Fixing) or 1d6 (to Organ Twisting), for each slot above first.

This spell will transfer the magical properties of one permanent magic item owned by the caster to another permanent magic item also owned by the caster. This is a permanent transference. All abilities and magic will be transferred from one item to the other, leaving the item from which the magic properties came from, mundane.

You touch a nonmagical object and receive a detailed impression of how it was put together. For this particular spell to take hold, the object must be a device with fine mechanical detail, such as moving parts. For the duration, you have advantage on any roll needed to repair or disassemble the object, and for the next hour, you have advantage on any roll needed to reproduce a set of schematics for the device. If the object is a lock of some description, you have advantage on any check made to pick it.

\r\n

As the wealth of information becomes greater, there is a cumulative 25% chance that each additional casting of the spell past the first will fail, if cast on the same object. This effect lasts until you finish a long rest.

For the duration of the spell, you transform one of your arms into any melee weapon you are proficient with that does not have the two-handed property. You can’t use that hand for anything besides attacking with that weapon, but you can’t be disarmed and it can be made of any nonmagical material (fantastical materials such as adamantine or mithral are magical for the purposes of this spell.) You may use a bonus action to end the spell early.

You fling a curse at one creature that you can see within range and force it to make a successful Constitution saving throw or suffer one affliction you choose from the following options for the duration:

\r\n
    \r\n
  • Piles: walking speed is reduced by 50% and Constitution saving throws are made with disadvantage
    • \r\n
  • Dizziness: Dexterity saving throws and attacks are made with disadvantage
    • \r\n
  • Migraine: vision is heavily obscured beyond 5 feet and concentration is lost after 1 round
    • \r\n
  • Sneezing Fit: a violent sneeze replaces the action in alternating rounds; cannot take reactions
    • \r\n
\r\n

Remove curse or similar, more powerful magic can dispel the effect.

Attacks","isGranted":false,"bonusTypes":[],"value":null,"availableToMulticlass":null,"modifierTypeId":0,"modifierSubTypeId":0,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"die":{"diceCount":null,"diceValue":null,"diceMultiplier":null,"fixedValue":null,"diceString":null},"count":1,"durationUnit":null,"usePrimaryStat":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]}}],"conditions":[],"tags":["Debuff","Combat"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":1711611,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":193233,"definitionKey":"1118725998:193233","name":"Vault of Souls","level":2,"school":"Necromancy","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":5,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":5},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

When you cast this spell, you immediately drink the blood of someone who has died within the last 15 minutes. By doing so, you absorbed their soul, preventing them from traveling to their afterlife. Instead the soul travels to an extra dimensional space within yourself. While in this space, the soul is able to hear and see what you experience, however it cannot interact with the outside world. You are able to freely communicate and mentally shape the extra dimensional space the souls resides in. Casting this spell again can allow you to inprison another soul in the same space, or free any number of souls from this space. 

\r\n

If you die while there are souls within this extra dimensional space. Your body, upon death, explodes dealing 1d4 force damage in a 5ft radius centered on you, as blood and gore splatters everywhere from the souls escaping from the space inside you. Spells such as deathward or other similar spells prevent this effect from happening. 

\r\n

When cast using a spell slot 3 or higher, you can absorb two additional souls for each slot above the original.

\r\n

When cast using a spell slot 5 or higher, you extend the radius in which you can absorb souls by 15ft for each spell level of 5 or higher.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"Dead blood (consumed)","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":1,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":true,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":5,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":5},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":9826129,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":1209963,"definitionKey":"1118725998:1209963","name":"Surgeon's Tough Love","level":2,"school":"Necromancy","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

 

\r\n
\r\n

Miraculous Necromancy from the Codex of Life. The use of this spell in a campaign assumes that there is a possibility of suffering various forms of permanent injuries that may require medical care or magical healing.

\r\n
\r\n

 

\r\n

Your hand is covered in a hovering spectral glove, and is able to go through skin and other deep tissue. As apart of the spell you can fix wounds or cause injuries, though the latter is thought of as malpractice, and will cause a member to be cast out of the Guild. 

\r\n
    \r\n
  • Surgery  Choose one willing creature that you can see within 20 ft. You remove one permanent injury from a creature you touch, the injury can be a broken bone, infected wound, dislocated shoulder or a traumatic brain injury. Other injuries can also be removed at the Dungeon Master's discretion. Additionally the creature regains hit points equal to 2d6 + your spellcasting modifier
    • \r\n
  • Organ Twisting  You send the spectral hand into a creature's body within range. You break a bone, or tear a muscle, or squeeze an artery. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or 2d6 + your spellcasting modifier of necrotic damage. 
    • \r\n
\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the effects of Surgery increases by 1d6 and you can remove one additional permanent injury from the creature. The effects of Organ Twisting increases it's damage with 1d6 per spell slot.

:null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":3342318,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":397085,"definitionKey":"1118725998:397085","name":"Nightshades Necrotic Needle","level":1,"school":"Necromancy","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You shoot a swirling red-green needle of necrotic energy from the palm of your hand at a foe. Choose one target within range and make a spell attack roll. On a hit the target takes 3d8 necrotic damage and you gain temporary hit points equal to half the damage dealt. Being within 5 feet of an enemy does not impose disadvantage on the attack roll of this spell. In addition if you have the target of the spell grappled you gain advantage on the attack roll. 

\r\n

At higher levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach that has blood in its body. On a hit, the creature takes 2d4 necrotic damage and you drain a number of vials of blood equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt, which you may automatically store into an empty vial in your possession. If the number of vials of blood you drained equals or exceeds the target's drain threshold (based on size as shown in the table below), the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the start of your next turn.

\r\n

 

\r\n

This spell does not change the number of vials of blood you can harvest from that creature's carcass.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d4 each slot above 2nd.

Artisan's Nest","level":2,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":8,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":"Cube","aoeValue":10},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

As you concentrate on a specific Crafting or Artisan's skill you are proficient on and envision everything needed for a project of that craft, a 10-foot-cube workstation of force springs into existence around you. The workstation (common) has all necessary tools for a common quality project conveniently and ergonomically organized. You may touch another creature proficient with a Crafting or Artisan's skill, even if you don't have it, to canalyze your energy building the workstation around the target for its needs.

\r\n

Creatures within the workstation and proficient on the appropriate Artisan's Tools have advantage on their Strength and Dexterity Crafting Checks.

\r\n

The workstation may be a forge, alchemist laboratory, cooking table and furnace, etc. All tools are magical and unbreakable (unless they're supposed to break) and are slightly transparent. They instantly fade if removed from the area of the workstation but may be used to attack within the area using the appropriate proficiency and stats of similar object (mostly \"improvised weapon\").

\r\n

Once the spell ends, every tool and material created by the spell fades from existance unless the caster use up the last minutes to cast it again prolonging it for more 8 hours. The spell also ends if its caster moves away from 120-foot-radius around the workstation.

\r\n

At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, both the workstation's quality improves one rank and its radius increases 5 ft for each level above 2nd.

You create two orbs of light the size of your fist that hovers near yourself and the target of your spell. The orb sheds dim light out to 10ft. and occupies the same space as the creature it is attached to. For the duration of the spell, you can communicate to the target of the spell as if you were right next to them and they can respond in kind. Your voice is as audible as if you were speaking from the orb itself. The orb can not communicate if one of you transfers to a different plane.

\r\n

At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell at 3rd level or higher, you create an additional orb and can attach it to another creature for each level above 2nd.

","snippet":"","concentration":true,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[{"level":1,"typeId":16,"dice":null,"value":1,"details":"Additional targets can be given a communication orb"}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Communication","Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":7361380,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":904928,"definitionKey":"1118725998:904928","name":"Salhazar's Summoned Secretary","level":1,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Day","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":7},"range":{"origin":"Unlimited","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

Tendering a contract with an extraplanar creature, you outsource your communications to a third-party to secure a degree of privacy.

\r\n

Calling into the extraplanar economy, you attract a tiny creature that agrees to serve as your personal secretary for magical communications.

\r\n

For the duration the creature intercepts all magical communications that target you, such as Message, Sending and Dream. The creature determines the intent and identity of the sender and informs you of the incoming communication. You may then elect to receive the communication as normal, respond through your secretary or ignore the communication entirely.

\r\n

When cast at higher levels the duration is extended by 1 day per every level of spell slot above first, and costs an additional 100 Gold Pieces for each additional day of duration after the first.

\r\n

The creature occupies the tiny wooden desk for the duration of the spell and does not move from it. The spell ends if the creature is attacked or harmed.

\r\n

The creature's type and personality are determined randomly.

\r\n

\r\n

4

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"A written contract and 200 Gold Pieces which the spell consumes, as well as a tiny wooden desk (F)","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1.1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[{"level":1,"typeId":3,"dice":null,"value":0,"details":"Duration extends by 1 day per level of spell slot used above first"}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Summoning","Communication","Buff","Social","Utility","Deception","Foreknowledge","Warding","Compulsion"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Unlimited","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":7},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":4345171,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":527857,"definitionKey":"1118725998:527857","name":"Restore","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

This is the spell that people think Mending is. This spell repairs and restores large to huge objects such as a broken statue to its original state. The spell can fully restore objects such as a 20 foot tall statue and a 20 foot by 20 foot area of broken buildings or bridges. Using the spell on something like burned documents restores the documents but cannot restore the writing that was on them.

\r\n

This spell can physically repair a magic item or construct, but the spell can't restore magic to such an object.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"a pound of mortar","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"characterlevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":8941858,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":1102700,"definitionKey":"1118725998:1102700","name":"Misremember","level":2,"school":"Enchantment","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You attempt to erase yourself from another creatures memory. One creature in range that you can see must make a Wisdom saving throw. If you are fighting the creature, it has advantage on the saving throw. On a failed save, you can affect the target's memory of an event that it experienced within the last hour. You can permanently eliminate all memory of yourself in the event, the target's filling the void you left in its memory with another plausible explanation. 

\r\n

A remove curse or greater restoration spell cast on the target restores the creature's true memory. 

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2,3],"componentsDescription":"smoke trapped in a crystal","saveDcAbilityId":5,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":true,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Social","Charmed"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":2718481,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":315668,"definitionKey":"1118725998:315668","name":"Anesthesia","level":1,"school":"Necromancy","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You touch one humanoid creature over a span of one minute, after that minute the creature gains the unconscious condition and will not wake up for the spells duration. while unconscious, the creature feels no pain and cannot be brought back to consciousness until the spell ends.

\r\n

unwilling creatures can make a constitution saving throw with disadvantage to resist the spell’s effect

\r\n

When the spell ends for any reason, the creature will gain one level of exhaustion and will regain consciousness. If the creature was already unconscious when cast, their current condition will instead be suspended for the duration of the spell.

\r\n

If this spell is cast onto a creature already under the spell's effects, or the creature is immune to the unconscious condition, the spell automatically fails and no spell slot or material components will be consumed.

\r\n

Higher Level Casting: When you cast this spell with a 2nd level spell slot or higher, the duration of the spell is increased by 1 hour per level.
